sourceString: This approach is independent of the ABC methodology and will allow comparisons between estimates from the two modelling approaches to judge robustness of results.
targetString: Habkani wuu ka madax banaanyahay habka ABC wuxuuna ogolaan doonaa isbarbardhigyo u dhaxeeya qiimaynada naqshadaynta labada hab si loo go'aamiyo xooganaanta natiijooyinka.

sourceString: RCGP RSC’s surveillance with PHE is defined as Health Protection under Regulation 3 of The Health Service (Control of Patient Information) Regulations 2002.
targetString: Ilaalinta RCGP RSC ee leh PHE ayaa loo qeexay inay tahay ilaalinta Caafimaad  ee hoostaga Sharciga 3 ee Adeega Caafimaadka (Xakamaynta Macluumaadka Bukaanka) sharciyada 2002.

sourceString: This has been confirmed by PHE’s Caldicott Guardian’s Office.
targetString: Tan waxaa xaqiijiyay xafiiska PHE Caldicott Guardian.

sourceString: We do not see any increased risk to practices or practitioners taking part in this surveillance.
targetString: Ma aragno wax khatar oo kor u kacday oo loo hawlgalo ama xirfadlayaasha caafimaad ee ka qayb qaadanaya ilaalintan.

sourceString: Infection prevention and control advice will follow extant national guidance.
targetString: Ka hortaga caabuqa iyo waanada xakamaynta ayaa raaci doona tilmaan qaran oo jirta.

sourceString: Any cases identified will be managed according to the PHE/NHS guidance in force at the time, including advice for identified contacts.
targetString: Kiisas walba oo la ogaado ayaa la maarayn doonaa iyadoo la tixgalinayo tilmaanta PHE/NHS ee meel taala waqtiga, ee ay kamid tahay waaninita xiriirada la aqoonsaday.

sourceString: However, our training will include reminders about safe handling of specimens and revision of infection control measures anticipated to be high in our practices.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, tababarkeena waxaa ku jira xusuusiyaal ku saabsan la tacaalis badqabta ee tijaabooyinka iyo dib u fiirinta talaabooyinka xakamaynta caabuqa ee la filayo inay sareeyaan hawlaheena.

sourceString: It is a key part of Regulation 12 about safe care and treatment, periodically inspected by the Care Quality Commission.
targetString: Waa qayb muhiim ah ee Xeerka 12 oo ku saabsan daryeel badqaba iyo daawayn, mararka qaar ay baaraan Gudiga Tayada Daryeelka.

sourceString: Travel History and Clinical Descriptors of the COVID-19 Infections
targetString: Taariikhda Socdaalka iyo Cadaymaha Caafimaad ee caabuqyada COVID-19.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC practices have been advised on the clinical coding that has been made available for COVID-19 across all CMR systems.
targetString: Hawlaha RCGP RSC ayaa lagu waaniyay koodh garaynta caafimaad ee laga dhigay mid la heli karo COVID-19 dhamaan daafaha nidaamyada CMR.

sourceString: This includes information on coding of clinical descriptors (Table 4) and any recent travel history.
targetString: Tan waxaa kamid ah macluumaadka ku saabsan koodh garaynta cadaymaha caafimaad (Jadwalka 4)

sourceString: Establishment of Extended Virology Sampling
targetString: Abaabulitaanka ee Sambalada Fayruuska la Dheereeyay.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC practices participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have started sampling from patients showing symptoms of LRTI.
targetString: Ka qaybgalista hawlaha RCGP RSC ee ilaalinta fayruuska influenza ee sanadka ayaa bilaabay baarista bukaanada ay ka muuqato calaamadaha LRTI.

sourceString: All samples received are being tested for influenza and COVID-19.
targetString: Dhamaan sambalada la helay ayaa laga baarayaa influenza iyo COVID-19.

sourceString: This has led to initial early identification of background spread in low-risk patients.
targetString: Tani waxay sababtay aqoonsi xilli hore ee taariikhda diditaanka bukaanada khatarta hoose.

sourceString: As of March 7, 2020, the surveillance system has detected 2 cases of COVID-19 in low-risk patients with no history of travel through extended virological sampling.
targetString: Maarso 7, 2020, nidaamka ilaalinta wuxuu ogaaday 2 kiisas oo COVID-19 bukaanada  khatrata hoose ee aan lahayn taariikh socdaal marka la fiiriyo tijaabinta fayruuska la dheereeyay.

sourceString: This protocol describes how we have adapted a national influenza surveillance system to monitor community spread of an unexpected infection of COVID-19.
targetString: Habkani wuxuu qeexayaa sida aan ula qabsanay nidaam ilaalin qaran ee influenza si loo kor joogteeyo ku fiditaanka bulshada ee caabuq aan la filayn oo ah COVID-19.

sourceString: We have rapidly created and incorporated new codes to allow data recording, and are collecting data to monitor the effectiveness of containment strategies.
targetString: Waxaan si xawli ah u samaynay oon iskaashi ku samaynay koodhadh cusub si ay u ogolaato diiwaan galista xogta, waxaana lasoo aruurinayaa xogta si lo kor jjoogteeyo waxtarka isaraatiijiyadaha xakamaynta.

sourceString: Through this surveillance, we intend to find out more about the epidemiology of COVID-19 in ambulatory care.
targetString: Iyadoo loo marayo korjoogtayntan, waxaan rajaynaynaa inaan ogaano waxbadan oo ku saabsan daraasad caafimaad ee COVID-19 ee daryeelka socda.

sourceString: In particular, its rate of spread, both temporal and geographical.
targetString: Gaar ahaan, xadkeeda faafitaanka, labadaba waqti iyo juqraafi ahaan.

sourceString: Our testing of low-risk patients will also inform whether the containment strategy that is based on virology testing of high-risk patients and their contacts plus self-isolation is effective.
targetString: Baaristeena bukaanada khatarta hoose ayaa sidoo kale wargelin doona in istaraatiijiyada xakamaynta ee ku dhisan baarista fayruuska ee bukaanada khatarta sare iyo kuway la xiriireen iyo marka lagu daro iskarantiil ay tahay mid shaqaynaysa.

sourceString: Containment should slow the spread, and there may be benefits in the management of spread from intense surveillance.
targetString: Xakamyntu waa inay hoos  u dhigtaa faafitaanka, waxaana jiri kara faaiidooyinka maaraynta faafitaanka ee ilaalinta qotoda dheer.

sourceString: However, there may come a point at which the virus spreads more widely into the population, as has happened in Italy.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqotee, waxaa laga yaabaa in ay imaato xaalad uu fayraska si baahsan ugu faafo dad weynaha, sidii ka dhacday Talyaaniga oo kale.

sourceString: Surveillance of low-risk patients should inform when we reach this tipping point and when infection rates start to remit.
targetString: Korjoogtaynta bukaanada halista hoose leh waa in lasoo wargaliyaa marka aan gaarno meesha ugu saraysa iyo marka heerka caabuqu u bilaabo in uu yaraado.

sourceString: The epidemiology of COVID-19 remains emergent.
targetString: Cudurka saf-mareenka ah ee COVID-19 waa mid  bilaw ah.

sourceString: The registration-based nature of UK primary care means that we will be able to create a complete picture of the cumulative incidence and duration.
targetString: Diwaangalinta ku dhisan nooca daryeelka aasaasiga ah ee UK kaas oo suuragalin doona abuurida sawir dhamaystiran ee dhacdooyinka guud iyo mudada.

sourceString: The surveillance system should be able to identify areas where COVID-19 spread is taking place that might be suitable for trials of antiviral therapy.
targetString: Nidaamka korjoogtaynta waa in uu awood u lahaadaa in uu ogaado meelaha faafitaanka COVID-19 uu ka dhacayo taas waxaa laga yaabaa in ay u haboontahay tijaabooyinka ku daweynta daawooyinka fayraska laga dagaalama.

sourceString: We could also follow up on the effectiveness or any adverse reactions to these medicines or vaccinations.
targetString: Waa in aan sidoo kale daba-galno waxtarka ama waxyeelada daawooyinkan ama talaaladan.

sourceString: Finally, early detection of a confirmed COVID-19 case has exemplified the rapid implementation of this enhanced surveillance in the national network.
targetString: Ugu dambayn, horey u ogaashada  kiisaska la xaqiijiyay ee COVID-19 waxay tusaale kabixisay dhaqan galinta korjoogtaynta kor loo qaaday ee shabakada qaran.

sourceString: Safety of practices is our primary concern.
targetString: Badqabka hawlgalada waa walaacayaga koowaad.

sourceString: The RCGP RSC has operated for over 50 years and has been involved in collecting samples to monitor disease and vaccine effectiveness through the Hong Kong flu pandemic of 1968/69, the Russian flu of 1977/78, and the 2009 Swine flu pandemic.
targetString: RCGP RSC waxay shaqaynaysay in ka badan 50 sanno iyadoo ku lug leheyd aruurinta sambalada si loo kormeero cudurka iyo waxtarka talaalka ayadoo la isticmaalayo harbagka caalimaga ee Hong Kong ee 1968/69, hargabka Ruuska ee 1977/78, iyo hargabka Doofaarka ee caalamiga ah.

sourceString: We are not aware of any increased risk to practice staff or other patients from involvement in surveillance.
targetString: Kama war hayno wax khatar korodhay ah ee lagu hawlgalinayo shaqaalaha iyo bukaanada kale inay ku lug lahaadaan ilaalinta.

sourceString: Pandemic preparedness is part of the role of the RCGP RSC.
targetString: U diyaargarawnaanta cudur caalami ah waa qayb ka mid ah  doorka RCGP RSC.

sourceString: It is plausible that enhanced coding of information from contacts with the practices in RCGP RSC will reduce the likelihood of people who may be suspected COVID-19 cases being brought to the surgery inadvertently.
targetString: Waa mid macquul gal ah galinta kor loo qaaday ee macluumaadk laga helay xiriirada dadka leh hawlaha RCGP RSC in ay dhimi doonto suurtgalnimada dadka looga shakiyay kiisaska COVID-19 kuwaas oo la  qalay si kama'a ah

sourceString: Where cases are detected unexpectedly, it is probably helpful for that patient, their contacts, and the practice to know.
targetString: Halka kiisaska laga helay si lama filaan ah, ayaa suurta gal ah in ay waxtar u leedahay bukaanada, kuwa ay la macaamileen, iyo hawlaha la rabo in la ogaado.

sourceString: The impact on practices has been to close for a day, if a case is found, for deep cleaning and then reopen.
targetString: Saamaynta dhaqamaha waxay ahayd in la xiro maalin, hadii kiis la helo, si si qotodheer loo nadiifiya hadane dib loo furo.

sourceString: The principal limitations of our system are the number of data points.
targetString: Dhibaatada ugu waaweyn ee nidaamkayaga waa tirada qodobada xogta.

sourceString: We are collecting serology and virology data from 100 sites, which covers a small group of the population.
targetString: Waxaan ka aruurinaynaa daraasadaha dheecaan dhiiga laga qaaday iyo daraadasadda fayraska 100 goob, kaas oo daboolaya kooxa dadweyna ah.

sourceString: This has been satisfactory for monitoring influenza, but we are not certain if this is a sufficiently large sample for the COVID-19 outbreak.
targetString: La socodka influenza waa mid wanaagsan, lakiin ma hubno in tani ay ku filantahay sambaladda badan ee dilaacitanka COVID-19.

sourceString: Our sites (surveillance practices) are currently fixed, and it could be helpful to be able to rapidly onboard practices in regions where there are more cases.
targetString: Goobahayaga (hawlaha korjoogtaynta) ayaa hadda la haagjiyay, waxayna sidoo kale caawin kartaa siay u suuragaliso in ay nidaamiso hawlaha gobolka meesha ay kiisaska ku badan yihin.

sourceString: Currently, we will be reporting weekly.
targetString: Hadda, waxaan u wargalin doona si isbuucla ah.

sourceString: Our existing system can be enhanced to twice weekly, but maybe daily or hourly data should be our current approach.
targetString: Nidaam yadana  jira ayaa la xxoojin karaa laba mar isbuuciba, lakiin xog maalinla ah ama saacadle ah waa in ahaata habkayaga  hada jira.

sourceString: Opportunistic sampling for serology in children younger than 10 years might be limited due to the overall reduced rate of blood tests in children.
targetString: Ka faa'iidaystayaasha sambala dheecaan dhiiga ee laga qaaday caruurta ka yar 10 sanno ayaa laga yaabaa in ay koobnaanto sababtoo ah hoos u dhigada guud ee heerka baadhitaanada dhiiga ee caruurta laga qaado.

sourceString: The extended surveillance using the RCGP RSC-PHE network for the emergent COVID-19 outbreak has been established rapidly.
targetString: Korjoogtaynta la balaadhiyay iyadoo la isticmaalayo shabakada RCGP RSC-PHE ee loogu talagalay dilaacitaanka dagdaga ah ee COVID-19 ayaa si daddag ah loo aasaasay.

sourceString: The model of getting the appropriate informatics to enable capture of the required data has already been a success, with data recording starting the week the codes were created.
targetString: Qaabka helida macluumaadka ku haboon si ay u suuragasho helitaanka xogta loo baahanyahay ayaa mar hor hore guulaysatay, iyada oo leh diwaan galinta xogta isbuuca koodhadha la sameeyay.

sourceString: In addition, modifying the existing surveillance system to collect population data in a parallel way has also been effective.
targetString: In taas waxaa dheer, wax ka badallida  nidaamka kor joogtaynta ee jira si loo aruuriyo xogta dad weynaha hab is barbar socda ayaa sidoo kale wax ku ool ah.

sourceString: However, we are at present unsure as to whether the scale of this surveillance provides sufficient data to drive local containment strategies or if reporting infrequently meets the need of our information age.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqotee, waqti xaadirkan ma hubno in heerka kor joogtayna uu leeyahay xog ku filan oo keeni karta istaatiijiyado joojineed ama hadii wargalinta aan joogtada ahayn aya daboosho baahidayada ee macluumaadka da'da.

sourceString: National Basketball Association suspends season due to COVID-19 concerns
targetString: Ururka kubadda kolayga qaran ayaa joojiyay xilli ciyaareedka walaaca COVID-19 awgiis.

sourceString: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.
targetString: Arbacadii, Ururka Kubada kolayga Qaran ee Maraykanka (NBA) ayaa joojiyay xilli ciyaareedkii kubadda kolayga xirfada lahaa walaac la xiriira COVID-19 awgiis.

sourceString: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Go'aanka NBA ayaa yimid kadib markii ciyaaryahan Utah Jazz laga helay fayruuska COVID-19.

sourceString: The NBA did not release the identity of the player in question in its announcement.
targetString: NBA maysan sii dayn aqoonsiga ciyaaryahanka lays waydiinayay ee ay shaaciyeen.

sourceString: They did say he was not present at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City, where the Utah Jazz were to play against the Oklahoma City Thunder.
targetString: Waxay dhaheen muusan joogin Chesapeake Energy Arena ee magaalada Oklahoma, halka Utah Jazz ay ahayd inay la ciyaaraan Oklahoma City Thunder.

sourceString: According to its press release, the NBA was "suspending game play following the conclusion of [Wednesday's] schedule of games until further notice."
targetString: Sida laga soo xiganayo warbaahintooda, NBA ayaa "joojinaysay ciyaarta iyadoo daba socota soo gabagabayntii jjadwalka [Arbacada] ee ciyaaraha ilaa iyo ogaysiis danbe."

sourceString: The Jazz's game was cancelled, as was another NBA game Wednesday between the Sacramento Kings and the New Orleans Pelicans.
targetString: Ciyaarta Jazz ayaa la joojiyay, halka ay jirtay ciyaar NBA oo kale Arbacadii oo u dhaxaysa SAcramento Kings iyo NEW Orleans Pelicans.

sourceString: Other games scheduled for Wednesday were still held, according to NBC News.
targetString: Ciyaarihii kale ee loogu talagalay Arbacada ayaa weli la joojiyay, sida laga soo xigtay wararka NBC.

sourceString: The United States' other major basketball organization, the National Collegiate Athletic Association, which runs college basketball, has cancelled its own tournament, March Madness, for both men's and women's leagues.
targetString: Ururka kale ee kubadda kolayga ee ugu wayn Maraykanka, Ururka Ciyaaraha Kulliyada Qaranka, kaas oo qabta kubadda kolayga kulliyada, ayaa joojiyay ciyaaraheeda, March Madness, ee labadaba liigaga raga iyo dumarka.

sourceString: According to Johns Hopkins University, as of Wednesday, there were at least 1,279 confirmed cases of COVID-19 in the United States.
targetString: Sida laga soo xigtay Jaamacada Johns Hopkins, Arbacadii, waxaa jiray ugu yaraan 1,279 kiisas COVID-19 oo la xaqiijiyay Maraykanka.

sourceString: CNBC reported there were at least 118,381 cases worldwide.
targetString: CNBC ayaa soo warisay inay jiraan ugu yaraan 118,381 kiisas caalamka oo dhan.

sourceString: US President Trump declares COVID-19 national emergency
targetString: Madaxweynaha Maraykan Trump ayaa ku dhawaaqay gurmadka qaran ee COVID-19

sourceString: On Friday, United States President Donald Trump declared a national emergency in response to the ongoing coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Jimcihii, Madaxweynaha Maraykan Donald Trump ayaa ku dhawaaqay gurmadka qaran ee ka jawaab celinta dilaacitaanka socda ee coronavirus.

sourceString: The move came two days after the World Health Organization declared the outbreak, which causes the COVID-19 disease, to be a pandemic.
targetString: Talaabada ayaa imaatay laba maalinkadib marka ay Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ay ku dhawaaqday dilaacinta ka, kaas oo sababay cudurka COVID-19, in uu yahay cudur caalami ah.

sourceString: The move gives the federal government access to around US$50 billion in extra funding to combat the pandemic, according to NBC News.
targetString: Talabadan waxay siinaysaa dawlada fedaraalka helitaanka ku dhawaad $50 bilyan oo doolar oo dheeri ah oo maal galin si ay ula dagaalanto cudurka caalamiga ah, sida laga soo xiganayo Wararka NCB.

sourceString: The proclamation specifically said "the COVID-19 outbreak in the United States constitutes a national emergency" and said the national emergency began on March 1, almost two weeks before the proclamation itself.
targetString: Ku dhawaaqida gaar ahaan waxay dhahday "dilaaca COVID-19 ee gudaha Maraykanka wuxuu ka koobanyhay gurmad qaran" wuxuu dhahay gurmadka qaran wuxuu bilaani Maarso 1, ugu badnaan laba isbuuc ka hor dhawaaqiska laftigeeda.

sourceString: The United States Department of Health and Human Services declared the outbreak a "public health emergency" on January 31.
targetString: Waaxda Caafimaadka iyo Adeega Aadanaha ee Maraykanka waxay ku dhawaaqday dilaacist "gurmadka caafimaadka guud" 31 Janaayo.

sourceString: Trump did not place the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) in charge of the government's response to COVID-19, which Politico reported left some experts in disaster management disappointed.
targetString: Trump muusan uga dhigan masuul Hay'adaha Maareynta Xaaladaha Degdegga ah ee Federaal ka jawaab celinta dawlada ee COVID-19, halka ay siyaasiin kusoo warameen in khubarada maareynta musiibooyinka qaar looga tagay xaalad murugsanaan ah.

sourceString: Politico quoted Tim Manning, formerly a deputy administrator at FEMA, as saying "FEMA has an important role in coordinating the larger response to the crisis" and "[i]f there's an emergency, FEMA needs to be involved."
targetString: Siyaasiga Tim Manning ayaa laga soo guuriyay, horaan ahaa maamula ku xigeenka ee FEMA, asagoo dhahaya "FEMA waxay ku leedahay door muhiim ah isku duwida jawaab celin balaadhan ee dhibaatadan" iyo "[i] hadii xaalad dagdag ah ay jirto, FEMA waxaa loo bahanyahay in ay ka qayb qaadato."

sourceString: Trump made the decision under provisions of the National Emergencies Act, amongst other governing authorities.
targetString: Trump ayaa goaan ku gaaray asagoo u maraya Xeerka Xaaladaha dagdaga ah ee Qaran, ee ay ka tirsanyihiin masuuliyiinta maamulaya.

sourceString: The Trump administration also announced other efforts in response to COVID-19, including waiving the interest it collects on federal student loans and increasing U.S. strategic oil reserve oil purchases.
targetString: Maamulka Trump ayaa sidoo kale ku dhawaaqay dadaalo kale oo looga jawaab ceelinaya COVID-19 oo ay ku jiraan ka dhaafida ribada daymaha ay ka ururiso ardayda federaalka iyo kordhinta istaraatiijiyada kaydinta saliida iyo iibinta saliida ee Maraykan.

sourceString: Impact of the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic on education
targetString: Safmarka 2019-20 coronavirus ayaa saamayn ku yeeshay nidaamka waxbarasho ee caalamka oo dhan, taas oo markaa horseeday in ay baahdo xidhitaanka dugsiyada iyo jaamacaduhu.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic has affected educational systems worldwide, leading to the widespread closures of schools and universities.
targetString: Laga bilaabo 8 Abriil 2020, celcelis aahan 1.716 bilyan oo arday ah ayuu saameeyay xidhitaanka dugsiga taas oo lagaga jawaabayo COVID-19.

sourceString: As of 8 April 2020, approximately 1.716 billion learners have been affected due to school closures in response to COVID-19.
targetString: Sida lagu sheegey la socodka UNESCO, 188 dal ayaa dhaqan geliyay amarka joogitaanka guriga iyo 5 ayaa dhaqan geliyay xidhitaanka deegaanka, taas oo saamaysay 99.4% ardayda caalamka.

sourceString: According to UNESCO monitoring, 188 countries have implemented nationwide closures and 5 have implemented local closures, impacting about 99.4%  of the world's student population.
targetString: Maarso 23 2020, Shaybaadhka Caalamiga ah ee Cambridge (CIE) waxa ay soo saareen bayaan ay ku dhawaaqayaan joojinta Cambridge IGCSE, Cambridge O Level,Cambridge International AS & A Level, Dhibloomada Cambridge ee AICE, iyo shaybaadhka Pre-U ee Cambridge ee Maajo/Juun 2020 taxanada dhamaan dalalka.

sourceString: On 23 March 2020, Cambridge International Examinations (CIE) released a statement announcing the cancellation of Cambridge IGCSE, Cambridge O Level, Cambridge International AS & A Level, Cambridge AICE Diploma, and Cambridge Pre-U examinations for the May/June 2020 series across all countries.
targetString: Xafiiska Imtixaanaadka ee Qaran waxa uu sidoo kale wuu joojiyay. Xidhitaanka dugsiga kaliya muu saamaynin ardayda, macalimiinta, iyo qoysaska, laakiin waxa uu leeyahay saamayn ka wayn oo dhaqaale iyo bulsho.

sourceString: International Baccalaureate exams have also been cancelled.School closures impact not only students, teachers, and families, but have far-reaching economic and societal consequences.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsiyada oo lagaga jawaabayo COVID-19 waxa uu soo saaray arrimo kale oo bulsho iyo dhaqaale oo kale, oo ay ku jiraan daynta ardayda, waxbarashada dhijitaalka ah, amaanka cuntada, iyo bilaa guri nimo, iyo sidoo kale helitaanka daryeelka ilmaha, daryeelka caafimaad, guryaynta, interternak iyo adeegyada laxaad la'aanta.

sourceString: School closures in response to COVID-19 have shed light on various social and economic issues, including student debt, digital learning, food insecurity, and homelessness, as well as access to childcare, health care, housing, internet, and disability services.
targetString: Saamaynteedu aad ayay u saamaysay qoysaska iyo caruurta laga sadbursaday, taas oo keentay khalkhal waxbarashada, waxyeelo nafaqada ah, mushkilado daryeelka ilmaha ah, iyo raad dhaqaale oo qoysaska ah kuwaas oo aan shaqayn karin. Iyada oo laga jawaabayo xidhitaanka dugsiga, UNESCO waxa ay ku talinaysaa isticmaalka waxbarashada la dhigayo iyada oo aan la isla joogin iyo in la furto barnaamijyada waxbarashada iyo madalaha dugsiyada iyo macalinku ay u isticmaali karaan waxbarashada iyada oo aan la wada joogin iyo in la xadido khalkhalka waxbarashada.

sourceString: The impact was more severe for disadvantaged children and their families, causing interrupted learning, compromised nutrition, childcare problems, and consequent economic cost to families who could not work.In response to school closures, UNESCO recommended the use of distance learning programmes and open educational applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to reach learners remotely and limit the disruption of education.
targetString: Dadaalka loogu jiro in la sameeyo qaab wax looga qabanayo faafitaanka COVID-19 oo aan ahayn dawo iyo talaabooyinka kahortaga sida kala fogaanshaha dadka iyo is aysoleet garaynta waxa ay keentay in baahsan loo xidho dugsiyada hoose, sare iyo farsamo wax ka badan 100 dal. Caabuqyada hore ee safmarka ahaa waxay horseedeen xidhitaanka waxbarashada ee caalamka oo dhan, heerar kala duwan oo saamayn ah.

sourceString: Efforts to stem the spread of COVID-19 through non-pharmaceutical interventions and preventive measures such as social-distancing and self-isolation have prompted the widespread closure of primary, secondary, and tertiary schooling in over 100 countries.Previous outbreaks of infectious diseases have prompted widespread school closings around the world, with varying levels of effectiveness.
targetString: Qaab xisaabeed ayaa muujiyay in faafitaanka safmarka uu markaa dib u dhigi karo xidhitaanka dugsiyada.

sourceString: Mathematical modelling has shown that transmission of an outbreak may be delayed by closing schools.
targetString: Laakiin, saamayntu waxay ku xidhan tahay xidhiidhka ay banaanka dugsiga ku leeyahay caruurta.

sourceString: However, effectiveness depends on the contacts children maintain outside of school.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsigu waxa uu wax ku ool yahay marka dhakhso loogu dhaqmo.

sourceString: School closures may be effective when enacted promptly.
targetString: Hadii xidhitaanka dugsigu uu yimaado wakhti danbe marka safmarku soo baxo, waxa yaraanaysa waxtarka ama wax samaayn ah ma yeelan karo.

sourceString: If school closures occur late relative to an outbreak, they are less effective and may not have any impact at all.
targetString: Sidoo kale, mararka qaar, dib u furida dugsiyada kadib marka la xidho dugsiga mudo kadib waxa uu kordhinayaa xadiga caabuqa.

sourceString: Additionally, in some cases, the reopening of schools after a period of closure has resulted in increased infection rates.
targetString: Maadaama oo xidhitaanku uu barbar socdo waxyaabo kale sida mamnuucida isku imaatinka dadka, waxaa adag in la qiyaaso saamaynta gaarka ah ee dugsigu leeyahay. Intii lagu jiray safmarkii hargabka 1918-1919 ee Maraykanka, dugsiyada waa la xidhay oo waxaa la mamnuucay isku imaatinka dadka taas oo la xidhiidhay yaraynta tirada xadiga dhimashada.

sourceString: As closures tend to occur concurrently with other interventions such as public gathering bans, it can be difficult to measure the specific impact of school closures.During the 1918-1919 influenza pandemic in the United States, school closures and public gathering bans were associated with lower total mortality rates.
targetString: Magaalooyinka dhaqan geliyay wax ka qabadkan hore waxa dib u dhacday inay gaadhaan heerka ugu sareeya ee dhimasho.

sourceString: Cities that implemented such interventions earlier had greater delays in reaching peak mortality rates.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsiyada ee mudo dhexe oo ah 4 todobaad sida ay muujinayso daraasda 43 magaalo oo Maraykanka ah taas oo lagaga jawaabayay Hargabkii Isbaanishka.

sourceString: Schools closed for a median duration of 4 weeks according to a study of 43 US cities' response to the Spanish Flu.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsiyada waxa ay muujiyeen inay hoos u dhigeen isku gudbinta hargabka Aasiya 90% safmarkii intii u dhaxaysay 1957-58, iyo 50% xakamaynta hargabka Maraykanka, 2004-2008. Dalal badan ayaa ku guulaystay inay yareeyaan faafitaanka caabuqa markii ay xidheen dugsiyada 2009 H1N1 Hargabkii ahaa.

sourceString: School closures were shown to reduce morbidity from the Asian flu by 90% during the 1957–58 outbreak, and up to 50% in controlling influenza in the US, 2004–2008.Multiple countries successfully slowed the spread of infection through school closures during the 2009 H1N1 Flu pandemic.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsiga ee magaalada Oita, Jabaan, waxa la ogaaday inuu horseeday in lagu guulaysto yaraynta tirada ardayda ee qaaday wakhtigii uu ugu badnaa caabuqu; laakiin xidhitaanka dugsiyada waxaa la ogaaday in aanu saamayn wayn ku yeelan dhimista tirada guud ee dadka qaadaya.

sourceString: School closures in the city of Oita, Japan, were found to have successfully decreased the number of infected students at the peak of infection; however closing schools was not found to have significantly decreased the total number of infected students.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsiga ee waajibka ah iyo talaabooyinka kala fogaanshaha dadka waxay la xidhiidhaan yaraynta 29% ilaa 37% xadiga isku gudbinta hargabka.

sourceString: Mandatory school closures and other social distancing measures were associated with a 29% to 37% reduction in influenza transmission rates.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsiga ee hore ee Maraykanka wakhtigii uu ugu badnaa safmarka 2009 H1N1 Hargabka ah.

sourceString: Early school closures in the United States delayed the peak of the 2009 H1N1 Flu pandemic.
targetString: Marka laga tuugo guusha guud ee xidhitaanka dugsigu keeney, waxbarashada xidhitaanka dugsiga ee Michigan waxaa la ogaaday inay "xidhitaanka dugsiga ee jawaabta heer degmo inayna waxba tarin." Intii lagu jiray hargabka iswayn 2009 ee Ingiriiska, maqaal uu magiciisu ahaa "Xidhitaanka dugsiga wakhtiga safmarka hargabka" oo ay qoreen Xanuunada Faafa ee Lancet, koox khubaro xanuunada faafa ah ayaa amaanay xidhitaanka dugsiyada si loo yareeyo caabuqa, oo yareeyo faafitaanka oo wakhtina loogu helo daraasada iyo soo saarka talaalka.

sourceString: Despite the overall success of closing schools, a study of school closures in Michigan found that "district level reactive school closures were ineffective."During the swine flu outbreak in 2009 in the UK, in an article titled "Closure of schools during an influenza pandemic" published in the Lancet Infectious Diseases, a group of epidemiologists endorsed the closure of schools in order to interrupt the course of the infection, slow further spread and buy time to research and produce a vaccine.
targetString: Maadaama oo la daraasadeedayay safmarka hargabka ee hore oo ay ku jiraan safmarkii hargabkii 1918, safmarka hargabkii 1957 iyo safmarkii hargabka 1968, waxa ay ka warameen saamaynta dhaqaale iyo shaqaalaha ee xidhitaanka dugsiga, gaar ahaan maadaama oo ay tiro badan boqoliiba yihiin dhakhtaartiirta iyo kaaliyayaasha caafimaadku dumar, kuwaa soo kala badh ay leeyihiin caruur ka yar 16 jir.

sourceString: Having studied previous influenza pandemics including the 1918 flu pandemic, the influenza pandemic of 1957 and the 1968 flu pandemic, they reported on the economic and workforce effect school closure would have, particularly with a large percentage of doctors and nurses being women, of whom half had children under the age of 16.
targetString: Waxa ay sidoo kale eegeyaan qaabka uu u faafo hargabku Faransiiska intii lagu jiray safaxa dugsiyada ee Faransiiska oo waxa ay arkeen in kiisaska xanuunku uu hoos u dhacay markii la xidhay dugsiyada oo uu dibna usoo noqday markii dib loo furay.

sourceString: They also looked at the dynamics of the spread of influenza in France during French school holidays and noted that cases of flu dropped when schools closed and re-emerged when they re-opened.
targetString: Waxa ay arkeen in marka macalimiinta Israaiil ay mudahadaraadeed xiligii hargabka ee 1999-2000, tirada dadka ee dhakhaatiirta ugu tagaya xanuunada hawo mareenka ayaa hoos ugu dhacday kala badh iyo libi laab.

sourceString: They noted that when teachers in Israel went on strike during the flu season of 1999–2000, visits to doctors and the number of respiratory infections dropped by more than a fifth and more than two fifths respectively.
targetString: Xarumaha dugsiyada iyo daryeelka ilmaha, Xarunta Kahortaga iyo Xakamaynta Xanuunada Maraykanku waxa ay ku talisay in xidhitaanka mudada gaaban ah ama jeermis ka dilida hadii qof xanuunka qabaa uu soo galo dhisma dugsiga iyada oo aan loo eegeynin hadii uu faafiyay iyo in kale.

sourceString: For schools and childcare facilities, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: Marka uu jiro qaabka ugu yar ee faafitaanka bulshada dhaxdeexa, khidada kala fogaanshaha ayaa la dhaqan gelin karaan sida in la joojiyo safarada   waxbarashada, isku imaatinada, iyo inay dad badan isku yimaadaan sida waxbarashda ama fasalada alamiitada ama cuntada maqaaxida, korodhka   masaafada u dhaxaysa miisaska, habaynta wakhtiga la imanaya iyo wakhtiga laga baxayo, xadidaada booqashada aan loo baahnayn, iyo isticmaalida xafiisyo gaar ah oo caruurta qaba calaamado sida hargabka ah oo kale.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as cancelling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: Marka ay jirto isku gudbin aad u wayn oo bulshad deegaanka ah, marka laga tago khidada kala fogaanshaha dadka, waxaa macquul ah in la kordhiyo mudada uu xidhan yahay dugsigu.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.
targetString: Janaayo 26, Jayna waxay soo saartaa talaabooyin lagu xakamaynayo faafitaanka COVID-19 taas oo lagu kordhinayo mudada Fasaxa Dayrta si loo xakameeyo faafitaanka.

sourceString: On 26 January, China instituted measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak which included extending the Spring Festival holiday to contain the outbreak.
targetString: Jaamacadaha iyo dugsiyada ee dalka oo dhan ayaa la xidhay.

sourceString: Universities and schools around the country closed.
targetString: Febraayo 23, Wasiirka Iran ee Caafimadka ayaa ku dhawaaqay xidhitaanka jaamacadaha, hay'adaha waxbarashada sare iyo dugsiyada dhawr magaalo iyo degmooyin.

sourceString: On 23 February, Iran's Ministry of Health announced the closure of universities, higher educational institutions and schools in several cities and provinces.
targetString: Maarso 3, UNESCO waxa ay soo saartay tiradii ugu horeeyay ee caalamka ee dugsiyada iyo jaacamada uu saameeyay.

sourceString: On 3 March, UNESCO released the first global numbers on school closures and affected students.
targetString: Waxaa la sheegey in 13 dal ay marka hore ka sii hortageen taas oo ay ku jirto xidhitaanka dugsiyada iyo jaamacadaha, taas oo saamaysay 290.5 milyan oo arday caalamka oo dhan.

sourceString: It reported that 13 countries had enacted preventive measures including the temporary closure of schools and universities, impacting 290.5 million students around the world.
targetString: Taas jawaabteeda, UNESCO waxa ay ugu baaqday inay dalalku dhaqan geliyaan waxbarashada iyada oo aan la joogin la isku dhigi karo si ay ardayda iyo qoysasku u helaan.

sourceString: In reaction, UNESCO called on countries to support affected students and families and facilitate large-scale inclusive distance learning programmes.
targetString: Maarso 4, dawlada Talyaaniga ayaa soo saartay amar in la wada xidho dhamaan dugsiyada iyo jaamacadaha dalka oo ah maadaama oo Talyaaniga markaa tirada dadka dhintay ay gaadheen 100.

sourceString: On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
targetString: Markii ay sidaa sameeyeen, Talyaanigu waxa uu noqday dalkii 22 aad ee sadexda qaaradood ee ku dhawaaqa ama markaa dhaqan geliya xidhitaanka dugsiyada.

sourceString: In doing so, Italy became one of 22 countries on three continents which had announced or implemented school closures.
targetString: Maarso 5, badanaa ardayda uu sameeyay talaabooyinka COVID-19 ee xaalada degdegu waxa ay ku sugnaayeen Jayna, taas oo 233 milyan oo arday ah uu sameeyay, waxaana ku xigtay Jabaan oo 16.5 arday ah iyo Iiraan oo ah 14.5 milyan oo arday

sourceString: On 5 March, the majority of learners affected by COVID-19 emergency measures were located in China, with 233 million learners affected, followed by Japan at 16.5 million and Iran at 14.5 million.
targetString: Maarso 10, mid kamid ah shan arday caalamka oo dhan "ayaa guriga u joogay COVID-19 dartiis" halka mid kamid ah afartii ardayna uu sii dhigan kari waayay waxbarashada sare.

sourceString: By 10 March, one in five students worldwide was "staying away from school due to the COVID-19 crisis" while another one in four was barred from higher education institutions.
targetString: Maarso 13, dawladaha 49 dal ayaa ku dhawaaqay ama dhaqan geliyay xidhitaanka dugsiyada, waxaana kamid ah 39 dal oo xidhay dugsiyada dalka oo dhan iyo 22 dal oo xidhay dugsiyada deegaamo.

sourceString: On 13 March, governments in 49 countries announced or implemented school closures, including 39 countries which closed schools nationwide and 22 countries with localised school closures.
targetString: Maarso 16, waxaa tiradaasi inta ay kasoo kacday 49 gaadhay 73 dal sida ay sheegtey UNESCO.

sourceString: By 16 March, this figure increased from 49 to 73 countries according to UNESCO.
targetString: Maarso 19, 50% ardayda caalamka oo dhan ayuu sameeyay xidhitaanka dugsigu, taas oo u dhiganta in 102 dal ay xidheen oo 11 dalna ay deegaanku xidheen taas oo saamaysay 850 milyan oo caruur iyo dhalinyaro ah.

sourceString: By 19 March, 50% of students worldwide were affected by school closures, corresponding to nationwide closures in 102 countries and local closures in 11 countries affecting 850 million children and youth.
targetString: Maarso 20, wax ka badan 70% ardayda caalamka ayuu sameeyay xidhitaanku, taas oo 124 dal ay xidheen dugsiyada.

sourceString: By 20 March, over 70% of the world's learners were impacted by closures, with 124 country-wide school closures.
targetString: Maarso 23, dhamaan dugsiyada Nayjeeriya ayay xidhay dawlada Nayjeeriyi, sidoo kale suuqaqa ayaa la xidhay oo caruurtana waxa ay waalidku ka mamnuuceen inay fiyaarada soo dhaafaan.

sourceString: On 23 March, all Nigerian school were found to have been closed down by Nigerian government, markets as well as companies were closed down and children were forbidden by parents to step out of their homes.
targetString: Maarso 26, dhamaan dugsiyada Niyuuslan iyo jaamacadaha ayaa la xidhay dalka oo dhan.

sourceString: On 26 March, all New Zealand schools and universities have been closed down across the country.
targetString: Dawladu waxay kusoo rogtay laba todobaad oo safar ah, taas oo ardayda u sahlaysa inay u gudbaan waxbarashada iyada oo guriga la joogo sidii ugu dhakhsaha badnayd.

sourceString: The government has imposed a two-week holiday, allowing schools to transition to forms of distant teaching as soon as possible.
targetString: Jaamacadaha waxaa la xidhay mudo hal todobaad ah, laakiin waxay intaa wixii ka danbeeya lagu sii waday waxbarashada online ahaan.

sourceString: Universities have closed for one week, but resumed with online teaching afterwards.
targetString: Adeegyada kale ee dugsiyada ayaa shaqaynayay, laakiin waxbarashada waxaa lagu koobay in guriga lagu dhigto.

sourceString: Other school services remain open, but teaching is restricted to distant learning.
targetString: Maarso 27, ku dhawaad 90 ardayda caalamku waxba may dhiganaynin.

sourceString: By 27 March, nearly 90 percent of the world's student population was out of class.
targetString: Deegaanada ay weli dugsiyadu u furnaayeen waxaa kamid ah Taywaan, Singaaboor, Awstaraaliya, Iswiidhan iyo meelo kamid ah Maraykanka.

sourceString: Regions with schools remaining open included Taiwan, Singapore, Australia, Sweden, and some U.S. states.
targetString: Maarso 29, wax ka badan 1.5 bilyan caruur ah iyo arday kale ayuu sameeyay xidhitaanka dugsiyada ee dalka oo dhami.

sourceString: By 29 March, more than 1.5 billion children and other students were affected by nationwide school closures.
targetString: Kuwa kale waxaa khalkhaliyay dugsiyada deegaankooda oo xidhan.

sourceString: Others were disrupted by localized closures.
targetString: Ilaa Abriil 6, waxaa la kordhiyay mudada ay xidhan yihiin dhamaan dugsiyada sare ee Kurkamistan.

sourceString: Until April 6, holidays were extended in all secondary schools of Turkmenistan.
targetString: Amar uu saxeexay Wasiirka Caafimaadka oo ahayd talaabo kahortag ah oo lagu doonayay in lagaga hortago faafitaanka xanuunka neefsiga oo markaa la xidhiidha safmarka coronavirus ee WHO.

sourceString: An order signed by the Ministry of Education as a preventative measure aims to prevent the spread of respiratory diseases in connection with the WHO coronavirus pandemic.
targetString: Dalal ah 10 ayaa deegaamo kaliya xidhay dugsiyadooda, UNECSO waxay ku qiyaastaa in 473,933,356 arday inay khatar ugu jirtaan (dugsiya hoose ilaa waxbarashada sare) iyo in 77,938,904 ardayna inay khatar ugu jiraan waxbarashada deegaanka.

sourceString: 10 countries have localised schools closures, UNESCO estimates  473,933,356  learners are potentially at risk (pre-primary to upper-secondary education) and 77,938,904 learners are potentially at risk in tertiary education.
targetString: Fiiro gaar ah: Tirada wadarta ah ee ardayda dhigta dugiyada hoose, xanaanada caruurta, dugsiga sare ee hoose, iyo dugsiyada sare ee sare ee heerarka waxbarashada [ISCED heerarka ah 0 ilaa 3], iyo sidoo kale heerarka waxbarashada deegaanka [ISCED heerarka ah 5 ilaa 8] kuwaas oo deegaan ahaan saamayn usoo gaadhay xidhitaanku waxa ay noqon karaan dalka oo dhan.

sourceString: Note: Figures correspond to total number of learners enrolled at pre-primary, primary, lower-secondary, and upper-secondary levels of education [ISCED levels 0 to 3], as well as at tertiary education levels [ISCED levels 5 to 8] who could be affected should localised closures become countrywide.
targetString: Tirada is qoraysa oo ku salaysan macluumaadka Tirakoobka Hay'ada UNESCO.

sourceString: Enrolment figures based on latest UNESCO Institute of Statistics data.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsiyada ee uu keenay safmarka COVID-19 waxa ay iftiimiyeen arrimo badan oo waxbarashada sidii loo heli lahaa ah, iyo sidoo kale arrimo balaadhan oo dhaqan dhaqaal ah.

sourceString: School closures in response to the COVID-19 pandemic have shed a light on numerous issues affecting access to education, as well as broader socio-economic issues.
targetString: Maarso 12, wax ka badan 370 caruur ah iyo dhalinyaro ah ayaan tegin waxbarashada maadaama oo uu si kumeel gaadh ah ama aan la garaynin wakhtiga dib loo furiyo loo xidhay dugsiyada dalka oo dhan taas oo ay dawladu amartay si loo yareeyo faafitaanka COVID-19.

sourceString: As of March 12, more than 370 million children and youth are not attending school because of temporary or indefinite country wide school closures mandated by governments in an attempt to slow the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: Maarso 29, ku dhawaad 90% ardayda caalamka ayuu saameeyay xidhitaanka dugsigu. Inkasta oo xidhitaanka dugsigu uu yahay wax kumeel gaadh ah, waxa uu ku kacay kharash badan oo bulsho iyo dhaqaale.

sourceString: As of 29 March, nearly 90% of the world's learners were impacted by closures.Even when school closures are temporary, it carries high social and economic costs.
targetString: Khalkhalka uu keeney xidhitaanka dugsiga ee bulshada oo dhan waxa uu sameeyay dadka, laakiin saamaynteedu waxa uu aad ugu darnaa caruurta iyo qoysaska laga sadbursaday oo ay ku jiraan khalkhalka waxbarashada, khalkhal nafaqada ah, mushkilad daryeelka ilmaha ah iyo dhaqaale burbur badan qoysaska aan shaqayn karin.

sourceString: The disruptions they cause affect people across communities, but their impact is more severe for disadvantaged children and their families including interrupted learning, compromised nutrition, childcare problems and consequent economic cost to families who cannot work.
targetString: Waalidka shaqeeya waxa ay u badan tahay inuu shaqada ka joogi doono marka dugsiga la xidho si uu u hayo caruurtiisa, oo markaa waxay ku waayaan mushaharka in badan oo waxsoo saarkiisa ayuu saameeyaa.

sourceString: Working parents are more likely to miss work when schools close in order to take care of their children, incurring wage loss in many instances and negatively impacting productivity.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsiga ee deegaanka waxa uu culayskii waxbarashada saaray waalidka oo masuuliyiintuna waxay u wareejiyeen caruurta dugsiyada furan.

sourceString: Localised school closures place burdens on schools as parents and officials redirect children to schools that are open.
targetString: Dumarka ayaa badanaa ah tirada ugu badan ee shaqaalaha daryeelka caafimaadka oo badanaana ma tegi karaan shaqada maadaama oo ay haystaan caruur dugsigii laga xidhay.

sourceString: Women often represent a large share of health-care workers and often cannot attend work because of childcare obligations that result from school closures.
targetString: Tani waxa ay ka dhigan tahay in xirfadlayaal badan oo caafimaad ayna iman xarumaha looga baahan yahay inta ay socoto mushkilada caafimaad.

sourceString: This means that many medical professionals are not at the facilities where they are most needed during a health crisis.
targetString: Maadaama oo aan la heleynin teknooloojiyada ama aanu jirin internetka xawaare sareeya, oo lagu kalsoon yahay waxa uu ka baajiyay ardayda deegaamada magaalooyinka ee kasoo jeeda qoysaska laga sadbursaday.

sourceString: Lack of access to technology or fast, reliable internet access can prevent students in rural areas and from disadvantaged families.
targetString: Bilaa teknooloojiyada ama internet wanaagsan waxa uu caqabad ku noqdan sii socodka waxbarashada, gaar ahaan ardayda qoysaska saboolka ah.

sourceString: Lack of access to technology or good internet connectivity is an obstacle to continued learning, especially for students from disadvantaged families.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsiyada ee uu keeney COVID-19, UNECSO waxay ku talisay in loo wareego waxbarashada guriga dhaxdiisa iyo in la furo barnaamijyo waxbarasho iyo madalo ay dugsiyada iyo macalimiintu ay ku bari karaan ardayda wax iyaga oo aan meel wada joogin oo markaa lagu yareeyo khalkhalka waxbarashada. Si loo kaalmeeyo yaraynta faafitaanka COVID-19, boqolaal laybareeri ayaa la si kumeel gaadh ah loo xidhay.

sourceString: In response to school closures caused by COVID-19, UNESCO recommends the use of distance learning programmes and open educational applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to reach learners remotely and limit the disruption of education.To aid in slowing the transmission of COVID-19, hundreds of libraries have temporarily closed.
targetString: Maraykanka, badanaa magaalooyinka waawayn waxay ku dhawaaqeen xidhitaanka laybareeriyada, waxaana ku jira Los Angeles, San Francisco, Seattle, iyo Magaalada New York, taas oo saamaysay 221 laybareeri.

sourceString: In the United States, numerous major cities announced public library closures, including Los Angeles, San Francisco, Seattle, and New York City, affecting 221 libraries.
targetString: Ardayda aan guriga ku haysan internet, tani waxa ay ku kordhisay mushkilada ah inay la socon karaan waxbarashada iyada oo gurigooda jooga.

sourceString: For students without internet at home, this increases the difficulty of keeping up with distance learning.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsiyada ayaa culays saaray waalidka iyo koriyayaasha ah inay hayaan caruurtooda oo ay maamulaan waxbarashada guriga lagu dhigayo inta ay caruurtoodu ka joogaan dugsiga.

sourceString: School closures puts a strain on parents and guardians to provide childcare and manage distance learning while children are out of school.
targetString: Maadaama oo ayna jirin ikhtiyaar kale, waalidka shaqeeyaa waxay caruurtooda ka tagaan iyada oo kaligood ah markii dugsiga la xidhay taasina waxay horseedi kartaa habdhaqan khatar ah, oo ay ku jirto korodhka saamaynta cadaadiska lodkood iyo balwado.

sourceString: In the absence of alternative options, working parents often leave children alone when schools close and this can lead to risky behaviours, including increased influence of peer pressure and substance abuse.
targetString: Caruur badan oo caalamka oo dhan ah ayaa ku tiirsan cuno bilaash ah ama qiimo jaban oo dugsiyada laga siiyo.

sourceString: Many children worldwide rely on free or discounted meals at schools.
targetString: Markii la xidhay dugsiyada, nafaqadooda ayaa dhaawacantay. Nafaqada ayaa kaalin mug leh ka qaadaya hormarka garashada iyo hormarka waxbarashada ee caruurta. Gobolka Washington, ilaa 45% gobolka 1.1 arday ee uu leeyahay ee dhigata dugsiyada shacabka iyo kuwa jaartarka waxa ay u qalmaan kaabista cuntada dugsiga.

sourceString: When schools close, nutrition is compromised.Nutrition plays a critical role in cognitive development and academic performance for children.In Washington State, around 45% of the states 1.1 million students enrolled in traditional public and charter schools qualify for subsidised school meals.
targetString: Ugu yaraan 520,000 oo arday ah iyo qoysaskooda ayuu saamayn karaa amaanka cuntadu taas oo uu keeney xidhitaanka dugsigu. Barnaamijyada cuntada dugsiga ayaa ah barnaamijka labaad ee la dagaalanka gaajada Maraykanka ee ku xiga food stamps.

sourceString: At least 520,000 students and their families may be affected by food insecurity as a result of school closures.School lunch programmes are the second-biggest anti-hunger initiative in the United States after food stamps.
targetString: Sanad kasta, ku dhawaad 30 milyan oo caruur ah ayaa ku tiirsan cuntada bilaashka ah ama qiimaha jaban ee la siiyo oo ay ku jiraan qureec, qado, nususaace, iyo xataa cashada. Alabama, oo gobolka oo dhan la xidhay 18 Maarso waxa uu saameeyay wax ka badan 720,000 arday, oo Maamulka gobolku waxa uu bayaamiyay in shaqaalaha dugsiga uu sidoo kale saameeyay saboolnimada inay abuuraan dalab lagu qaybinayo oo dalka oo dhan ah cuntada oo lagu siinayo ardayda ku tiirsan qadooyinka dugsiga.

sourceString: Every year, nearly 30 million children rely on schools to provide free or low-cost meals including breakfast, lunch, snacks, and even dinner.In Alabama, where state-wide school closures as of 18 March have affected over 720,000 students, the state Superintendent announced that staff in schools disproportionately affected by poverty would create meal distribution networks to provide food for students who rely on school lunches.
targetString: Xidhitaanka dugsigu waxa uu saamayn xun ku yeeshay natiijada waxbarashada ardayga.

sourceString: School closures negatively impact student learning outcomes.
targetString: Dugsigu waxa ay bixiyaan daruuriyaadka waxbarashada oo marka la xidho, caruurta iyo dhalinyarta waxaa laga qaaday fursadii ay ku kori lahaayeen ee ay ku hormari lahaayeen.

sourceString: Schooling provides essential learning and when schools close, children and youth are deprived opportunities for growth and development.
targetString: Ardayda saboolka ahi waa kuwa hadii ayna helin waxbarasho ay yar tahay fursadaha ay haystaan ee hormar. Xadiga ardayda inay iska daayaan waxbarashada ayaa kordahaya marka la xidho dugsiga maadaama oo ay adag tahay in la xaqiijiyo in dhamaan ardaydu ay kusoo noqoto dugsiga marka la dib loo furo.

sourceString: The disadvantages are disproportionate for under-privileged learners who tend to have fewer educational opportunities beyond school.Student drop-out rates tend to increase as an effect of school closures due to the challenge of ensuring all students return to school once school closures ends.
targetString: Tani waxa ay kusii badan tahay meelaha marka hore lasii xidhay. Dugsiyadu waxa ay ahaayeen meel xarun ah hawlaha bulshada iyo isdhaxgalka bilaa aadanka.

sourceString: This is especially true of protracted closures.Schools are hubs of social activity and human interaction.
targetString: Marka la xidho dugsiga, caruur iyo dhalinyaro badan ayaa lahayn cid ay wada xidhiidhaan taas oo markaa daruuri u ah waxbarashada iyo hormarka. Marka la xidho dugsiga waalidka ayaa badanaa laga dalbadaa inay u fududeeyaan caruurta waxbarashada guriga oo waxaa ku adkaan kara inay taas sameeyaan.

sourceString: When schools are closed, many children and youth miss out of on social contact that is essential to learning and development.When schools close parents are often asked to facilitate the learning of children at home and can struggle to perform this task.
targetString: Taasi waxa ay kusii badan tahay waalidka aqoontooda iyo khayraadka ay haystaan uu yar yahay.

sourceString: This is especially true for parents with limited education and resources.
targetString: Saamaynta uu keeni karo xidhitaanka dugsiga iyo isku halaynta waxbarashada guriga kama hadlaan shuruucda federalka ee xeerarka wakhtigani.

sourceString: Potential impacts of school closures and reliance on distance learning are not addressed in federal acts of legislation at this time.
targetString: Waxbarashada rasmiga ah - taas oo kasoo horjeeda waxbarashada aan rasmiga ahayn ama bilaa waxbarashada rasmiga ah - waxaa looga jeedaa badanaa dugsiyada, kuuliyadaha, jaamacadaha, iyo hay'adaha waxbaraasho.

sourceString: Formal education — as opposed to informal education or non-formal education — tends to refer to schools, colleges, universities and training institutions.
targetString: Warbixin 1974 uu soo saarka Bangiga Adduunku ayaa lagu sheegey waxbarashada rasmiga ah inay tagay mid raacda: Waxbarashada Rasmiga ah: qaab kala sareeya, sida ay u kala horeeyaan fasaladu 'nidaamka waxbarasho', kaas oo kasoo bilaabma dugsiga hoose ilaa jaamacada oo ay ku jiraan, sidoo kale wax dhigashada waxbarashada guud, waxbarasho kala duwan oo gaar ah barnaamijyo ah iyo hay'adaha tobobarka farmaso iyo xirfadeed ee laba gelin. Badanaa macluumaadka laga uruuriyay tirada ardayda ee uu saameeyay COVID-19 waxaa lagu xisaabiyay xidhitaanka nidaamka waxbarashada rasmiga ah.

sourceString: A 1974 report by the World Bank defined formal education as the following:Formal education: the hierarchically structured, chronologically graded ‘education system’, running from primary school through the university and including, in addition to general academic studies, a variety of specialised programmes and institutions for full-time technical and professional training.The majority of data collected on the number of students and learners impacted by COVID-19 has been calculated based on the closure of formal education systems.
targetString: Tirakoobka Hay'ada UNESCO waxa lagu sheegey tirada ardayda ee uu saameeyay COVID-19 inay u dhiganto tirada ardayda ee ku jirta xanaanada caruurta, dugsiga hoose, dugsiga dhexe, iyo dugsiga sare heerarka waxbarasho ee ah [ISCED heerarka ah ee 0 ilaa 3], iyo sidoo kale heerarka waxbarashada deegaanka ee [ISCED heerarka ah ee 5 ilaa 8].

sourceString: The UNESCO Institute for Statistics provides figures on students impacted by COVID-19 corresponding to the number of learners enrolled at pre-primary, primary, lower-secondary, and upper-secondary levels of education [ISCED levels 0 to 3], as well as at tertiary education levels [ISCED levels 5 to 8].
targetString: Barnaamijyada waxbarashada caruurnimada hore ah caadiyan waxaa loogu talo geley caruurta ka yar 3 jirka ah waxaana loo yaqaan waxbarashada dugsiga kahor, xanaanada caruurta, kindergaardhenka, iyo barnaamijyada qaar maalintii caruurta lagu hayo.

sourceString: Early childhood educational programmes are usually designed for children below the age of 3 and may refer to preschools, nursery schools, kindergartens, and some day care programmes.
targetString: In kasta oo la xidhay waxbarashada dugsiga hoose iyo sare caalamka oo dhan COVID-19 dartiid, talaabooyinka la qaaday ee saamaynaya barnaamijyada waxbarashada caruurnimada hore wuu kala duwan yahay.

sourceString: While many primary and secondary schools have closed around the world due to COVID-19, measures impacting early childhood educational programmes have varied.
targetString: Dalalka iyo deegaanada qaar, waxbarashada dugsiga kahor iyo xarumaha maalintii caruurta lagu hayo waxaa loo arkaa inay yihiin adeegyada daruuriga ah oo lamana xidhin sida loo xidhay waxbarashada kale. Maraykanka, Waaxda Gobolka Washington ee Caruurta, Dhalinyarta, iyo Qoysasku waxa ay ku dhiiri gelisaa daryeelka caruurta iyo xarumaha waxbarashada hore inay furnaadaan.

sourceString: In some countries and territories, preschools and day cares are considered necessary services and have not closed in tandem with broader school closure measures.In the United States, the Washington State Department of Children, Youth, and Families encouraged child care and early learning centres to stay open.
targetString: Degmooyinka dugsiyada qaar waxa ay bixin karaan ikhtiyaar daryeelka ilmaha oo kale, oo mudnaanta lagu siinayo shaqaalaha gurmadka degdeg ah iyo shaqaalaha daryeelka caafimaad.

sourceString: Some school districts may offer alternative child care options, prioritising the children of first responders and healthcare workers.
targetString: Badhasaabka Maryland waxa uu waajibiyay in adeegyada daryeelka caruurta ah ee gaarku ay u furnaadaan caruurta shaqaalaha gurmadka degdega ah ee Gobolka Washington oo California-na waxay taas u daysay go'aandeega bixiyaha daryeelka.

sourceString: The governor of Maryland mandated that specific child care services remain open for the children of emergency personnel while Washington State and California have left it to the discretion of care providers.
targetString: Badhasaabka California Gavin Newson waxa uu ku sheegey mawqifkiisa, oo uu yiri "waxa aanu u baahanahay xarumaheena daryeelka ilmaha, xarumaha maalintii caruurta lagu hayo, inay shaqeeyaan si ay u muquuniyaan xidhitaanka dugsiyada."

sourceString: California Governor Gavin Newsom explained his state's position, saying “We need our child care facilities, our daycare centers, to operate to absorb the impact of these school closures.”
targetString: Colorado waxa ay ku dhiiri gelisaa samaynta "bushqada agabka" ee waalida in lagu isticmaalo guriga si markaa loogu dhigo waxbarashadii caruurtu ay ku qaadanayeen waxbarashada hore. Jabaan, Raysal Wasaare Shinzo Abe waxa uu ku dhawaaqay xidhitaanka dhamaan dugsiyada dalka oo dhan ilaa Abriil 8, laakiin, xarumaha maalintii caruurta lagu hayo waa laga soo reebey.

sourceString: Colorado has encouraged the development of "tool kits" for parents to use at home to emulate the lessons children would have received in their early learning programmes.In Japan, Prime Minister Shinzo Abe closed all schools throughout the country until April 8, however, children's daycare facilities were excluded.
targetString: Horaantii Maarso, shan urur oo dadka waawayn ah oo leh xarumo xanaano oo caruurta aan gaadhin ah waxbarashada oo ku yaal Kobe ayaa laga heley coronavirus.

sourceString: In early March, five adults associated with a nursing facility for preschool children in Kobe tested positive for coronavirus.
targetString: kadib markii la baadhay boqolaal caruur ah oo ku jiray xarumaha, waxaa ardayda aan gaadhin waxbarashada la ogaaday inay qabaan xanuunka.

sourceString: After testing over one hundred children at the facility, a preschool student was found to be carrying the virus.
targetString: Dugsiga hoose iyo dhexe waxa uu ka kooban yahay afarta ilaa todobada sano ee ugu horeeya waxbarashada rasmiga ah.

sourceString: Primary or elementary education typically consists of the first four to seven years of formal education.
targetString: Hay'ada Imtixaanaadka Caalamiga ah (IBO) waxa ay joojisay imitxaankii Barnaamijka Dhibloomada iyo Mihnada barnaamijyada la xidhiidhay oo qorshaysnaa intii u dhaxaysay 30 Abriil iyo 22 Maajo 2020, taas oo la sheegey inay saamayn ku yeelatay wax ka badan 200,000 oo arday caalamka oo dhan.

sourceString: The International Baccalaureate Organization (IBO) canceled the examinations for its Diploma Programme and Career-related Programme candidates scheduled between 30 April and 22 May 2020, reportedly affecting more than 200,000 students worldwide.
targetString: IBO waxay sheegeen in lasiin doono dadkaa kusoo baxay dhibloomadooda ama shahaadadooda iyada oo laga duulayo "layslisyada ay ka shaqeeyaan" iyo qiimaynta khabiirada, dareenka, iyo xakmaynta tayada ee hore barnaamijka loogu dhisay."

sourceString: The IBO stated that it would award candidates their diplomas or certificates based on "their coursework" and "the established assessment expertise, rigor, and quality control already built into the programme."
targetString: Waxbarashada deegaamada, sidoo kale ah waxbarashada sare, waxaa loola jeedaa heerarka waxbarashada ee aan waajibka ahayn ee ka danbaysa dhamaystirka dugsiyada sare ama dugsiga sare.

sourceString: Tertiary education, also known as higher education, refers to the non-compulsory educational levels that follow completion of secondary school or high school.
targetString: Waxbarashada qaybaheeda caadiga waxaa jaamacada ka hooseeya dhamaysigeeda iyo shahaadada sare, iyo sidoo kale waxbarashada iyo tobobarka farsamada.

sourceString: Tertiary education is normally taken to include undergraduate and postgraduate education, as well as vocational education and training.
targetString: Shakhsiyaadka dhamaystirtay qaybaha waxbarashada guud waxa ay qaadaan shahaado, dhiblooma, ama dhigtii waxbarasho.

sourceString: Individuals who complete tertiary education generally receive certificates, diplomas, or academic degrees.
targetString: Waxbarashada jaamacada aan la dhamaystanin weli waxaa weeye waxbarashada ka danbaysa dugsiga sare iyo kahor inta aan jaacamada laga qalin jabinin, taas oo ardayda caadiyan la siiyo shahaadada baajolarka.

sourceString: Undergraduate education is education conducted after secondary education and prior to post-graduate education, for which the learner is typically awarded a bachelor's degree.
targetString: Ardayda ku jirta barnaamijyada waxbarashada sare ee kuuliyada, jaamacadaha, iyo kuuliyada bulshada waxaa badanaa loo yaqaan dalalka sida Maraykanka "ardayda kuuliyadaha." Xidhitaanka kuuliyadaha iyo jaacamaduhu waxa uu si balaan u sameeyay ardaya, xarumaha, maamulka, iyo xarumaha waxbarashada laftooda.

sourceString: Students enrolled in higher education programmes at colleges, universities, and community colleges are often refereed to in countries such as United States as "college students."The closure of colleges and universities has widespread implications for students, faculty, administrators, and the institutions themselves.
targetString: Kuuliyadaha iyo jaamacadaha Maraykanka oo dhan waxaa laga dalbaday inay ardayda u celiyaan fiigii iyo kharashkoo qololka iyo qoraalka.

sourceString: Colleges and universities across the United States have been called upon to issue refunds to students for the cost of tuition and room and board.
targetString: Maraykanka, Kuuliyadaha iyo jaamacadaha waxay u shaqeeyaan sidii "magaalooyin yaryar" kuwaas oo usoo saara dhaqaale xoogan magaalooyinka, gobolada, iyo deegaamada.

sourceString: In the United States of America, Colleges and universities operate as "mini-cities" which generate significant revenue for cities, states, and regions.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, Jaamacada Princeton waxa ay dhaqaalaha New Jersey ku dartaa $1.58 milyan USD oo ardayduna waxay celcelis ahaan wixii jaamacada ka baxsan ku bixiyaan ilaa $60 milyan oo kharas ah.

sourceString: For example, Princeton University contributed $1.58 billion USD to the New Jersey economy and students spent about $60 million in off-campus spending.
targetString: Kuuliyadaha iyo jaamacadaha xidhitaankoodu waxa saameeyay dhaqaalaha oo uu saamayn wayn ku yeeshay. Sida ay sheegtey Linda Bilmes oo ka socota Harvard Kennedy School, "hudheelada, maqaaxiyada, macmacaanlayaasha, tukaamada, hay'ada kireeya gaadiidka, iyo ganacsiyada kale ee deeganku waxa ay dakhli laxaad la' ka helaan todobaadka qalinjabinta iyo munaasabada dib la iskugu yimaado kuuliyadaha...

sourceString: College and university closures have a domino effect on economies with far-reaching implications.According to Linda Bilmes of the Harvard Kennedy School, "local hotels, restaurants, cafes, shops, car rental agencies and other local businesses obtain a significant share of annual revenue from graduation week and college reunions...
targetString: bulshooyinakn waxa soo gaadhaya dhaqaale burbur xoogan hadii kuuliyaduhu sidaa u xidhnaadaan wakhtigaas. " Magaalooyinka yaryr ee ku tiirsan ardayda kuuliyada si ay dhaqaalaha deegaanka uga helaan iyo ganacsiyada deegaanka ee shaqaalaysii ayaa s gaar ah u saamayn dooaa xidhitaanka dugsiga iyo ka joojinta ardada xarumaha waxbarashada.

sourceString: these communities will suffer a lot of economic damage if the colleges remain closed at that time."Small towns which rely on college students to support the local economy and provide labour to local businesses are especially impacted by school closures and the exodus of students from campus.
targetString: Ithaca, New York, Jaamacada Cornell waxa ay ardaydu ugu yaraan $4 milyan ku bixisaan todobaadkii degmada Tompkins.

sourceString: In Ithaca, New York, Cornell University students spent at least $4 million a week in Tompkins county.
targetString: Markii lagu warheley go'aanka Cornell ee ah inayna ardaydu guryaha kasoo bixin fasaxa dayrta iyo inay u wareegaan waxbarashada maqal iyo muuqaalka ah, Duqa Ithaca waxa uu ku baaqay "talaabo degdeg ah oo federalka ah oo khasab ah - waxa aanu aragnaa saamaynta xun ee dhaqaalaha ee uu keeney xidhitaanka Jaamacada Cornell."

sourceString: In the wake of Cornell's decision to keep students home following spring break and transition to virtual instruction, the Mayor of Ithaca called for "immediate and forceful federal action — we will see a horrific economic impact as a result of Cornell University closing."
targetString: UNESCO waxay wadaagtay 10 talo mudadan:

sourceString: UNESCO is sharing 10 recommendations during this period:
targetString: In la tijaabiyo diyaar garawga iyo doorashada agabka munaasabka ah: Go'aaminta isticmaalka teknoolooniyada sare iyo xalka teknooloojiyada hoose taas oo ku salaysan sida looga heli karo deegaanka oo tamarta looga heli karo, internetka, iyo xirfadaha dhijitaalka ah ee macalimiinta iyo ardayda.

sourceString: Examine the readiness and choose the most relevant tools: Decide on the use high-technology and low-technology solutions based on the reliability of local power supplies, internet connectivity, and digital skills of teachers and students.
targetString: Taasi waxa ay noqon kartaa madasha dhijitaalka ah, duruusta laga bartay, MOOCs, ka baahinta idaacadaha iyo TVyada.

sourceString: This could range through integrated digital learning platforms, video lessons, MOOCs, to broadcasting through radios and TVs.
targetString: Xaqiijinta ka wada qayb galka barnaamijyada waxbarashada guriga: Dhaqan gelinta talaabooyin lagu xaqiijinayo in ardaydu ay ku jiraan kuwa laxaadka la' ama kasoo jeeda dadka saboolka ah inay heli karaan waxbarashada iyada oo aan la wada joogin la isku dhigo, hadii ay kaliya tiro yar oo xadidan ay heli karaan aaladaha dhijitaalka ah.

sourceString: Ensure inclusion of the distance learning programmes: Implement measures to ensure that students including those with disabilities or from low-income backgrounds have access to distance learning programmes, if only a limited number of them have access to digital devices.
targetString: Waxa aad isla eegtaan in meel dhexe la dhigo aaladaha sida kolbuyuutar laab ilaa qoysaska iyo taageerada helitaanka internet.

sourceString: Consider temporarily decentralising such devices from computer labs to families and support them with internet connectivity.
targetString: Ilaalinta sirta macluumaadka iyo amaanka macluumaadka: Gelitaanka macluumaadka amaanka ah marka la gelinayo macluumaadka ama khayraadka waxbarashada ee goobaha websaytyada, sida marka lala wadaagayo hay'ada kale ama shakhsiyaadka.

sourceString: Protect data privacy and data security: Assess data security when uploading data or educational resources to web spaces, as well as when sharing them with other organisations or individuals.
targetString: In la xaqiijiyo in isticmaalka barnaamijka iyo madasha ayna kahor imanaynin macluumaadka sirta ah ee ardayga.

sourceString: Ensure that the use of applications and platforms does not violate students’ data privacy.
targetString: In mudnaanta lasiiyo xalalka lagaga jawaabayo caqabada cilmi nafsi kahor inta aan la bilaabin wax dhigista: In la isku keeno agabka la heli karo si loogu xidhmo dugsiyada, waalidiinta, macalimiinta, iyo ardayda dhaxdooda.

sourceString: Prioritize solutions to address psychosocial challenges before teaching: Mobilize available tools to connect schools, parents, teachers, and students with each other.
targetString: Samaynta bulshooyin si loo xaqiijiyo in si joogto ah dadku u macaamiilan, in la suuro geliyo talaabooyinka daryeelka bulshada, iyo in laga jawaabo caqabadaha cilmi nafsi ee iman kara ee ardayda soo gaadhi kara marka ay kaligood noqdaan.

sourceString: Create communities to ensure regular human interactions, enable social caring measures, and address possible psychosocial challenges that students may face when they are isolated.
targetString: Qorshaha jadwalka waxbarasho ee barnaamijyada waxbarashada iyada oo meel aan la wada joogin: In lasoo qaban qaabiyo madalo lagaga wada hadlayo cida ay khusayso si loo eego macluumaadka mudada uu xidhnaanayo dugsiyadu iyo in la go'aamiyo in diirada loo saaro waxbarashada meel aan la wada joogin inay noqoto qaab cusub oo wax la iskugu dhigo oo si la qiro ama in aqoonta ardayda lagu kordhiyo kahor inta ayna waxbarashada gelin.

sourceString: Plan the study schedule of the distance learning programmes: Organise discussions with stakeholders to examine the possible duration of school closures and decide whether the distance learning programme should focus on teaching new knowledge or enhance students’ knowledge of prior lessons.
targetString: Qorshaynta jadwalka oo ku xidhan xaalada aaga uu saameeyay, heerarka waxbarasho, baahiyaha ardayda, iyo helitaanka waalidka.

sourceString: Plan the schedule depending on the situation of the affected zones, level of studies, needs of students needs, and availability of parents.
targetString: Waxa aad doorataa qaabka munaasabk ah ee wax dhigashada taas oo ku xidhan xaalada xidhitaanka dugsiga iyo isku soo xidhka guriga.

sourceString: Choose the appropriate learning methodologies based on the status of school closures and home-based quarantines.
targetString: Waxa aad iska ilaalisaa qaabka u baanan xidhiidhka foolka-foolka ah.

sourceString: Avoid learning methodologies that require face-to-face communication.
targetString: In lasiiyo taageero macalimiinta iyo waalidka ah sidii loo isticmaali lahaa agabka dhijitaalka ah: in la sameeyo tobobkar kooban ama macluumaad hordhac bixin oo waalidka iyo macalinka ah sidoo kale, hadii loo baahdo kormeer iyo u fududayn.

sourceString: Provide support to teachers and parents on the use of digital tools: Organise brief training or orientation sessions for teachers and parents as well, if monitoring and facilitation are needed.
targetString: In laga caawiyo macalimiinta inay u diyaar garoobaan habdhismeedka aas aasiga ah sida xalka isticmaalka internetka mobile-ka hadii loo baahdo inay toos u baahiyaan casharada.

sourceString: Help teachers to prepare the basic settings such as solutions to the use of internet data if they are required to provide live streaming of lessons.
targetString: In lagu soo daro qaabka munaasabka ah iyo in la xadido tirada barnaamijyada iyo madalaha: In lagu soo daro agabka ama saxaafada la heli ay heli karaan badanaa ardaydu, taas oo ah xidhiidh iyo duruus hore u jiray ama cusub, iyo wax dhigasho cusub ama hore u jirtay.

sourceString: Blend appropriate approaches and limit the number of applications and platforms: Blend tools or media that are available for most students, both for synchronous communication and lessons, and for asynchronous learning.
targetString: Si looga hortago culayska ardayda iyo waalidka oo ah in laga dalbado inay soo dejistaan oo ay tijaabiyaan barnaamijyo ama madalo badan sidoo kale.

sourceString: Avoid overloading students and parents by asking them to download and test too many applications or platforms.
targetString: In la samaysto shuruucda waxbarashada meesha aanay ardayda iyo macalinku waxa joogin iyo in lala socodo ardayda inta wax la baranayo: In la isla eego shuruucda waalidka iyo ardayda waxbarashada meesha aaan la wada joogin.

sourceString: Develop distance learning rules and monitor students’ learning process: Define the rules with parents and students on distance learning.
targetString: In la sameeyo qaabka su;'aalaha, imtixaanaadka, ama alamiitada si loola socdo si dhaw nidaamka waxbarashada ardayda.

sourceString: Design formative questions, tests, or exercises to monitor closely students’ learning process.
targetString: Isku day inaad isticmaasho taageerada gudbinta ee jawaabaha ardayda iyo in la iska ilaaliyo culayska waalidka iyada oo looga baahanayo inay soo sawiraan oo ay diyaar jawaabta ardayda.

sourceString: Try to use tools to support submission of students’ feedback and avoid overloading parents by requesting them to scan and send students’ feedback
targetString: In la bayaamiyo mudada waxbarashada meesha aan la wada joogin taas oo ku salaysan xirfadaha ismaamulida ardayga: In la sameeyo wakhti macquul ah oo heerarka ardayda ee ismaamulida nafta ah iyo awooda dheehashada gaar ahaan wakhtigan fasalada tooska loo baahinayo.

sourceString: Define the duration of distance learning units based on students’ self-regulation skills: Keep a coherent timing according to the level of the students’ self-regulation and metacognitive abilities especially for livestreaming classes.
targetString: Waxaa la doorbidayaa in qaybaha dugsiga hoose inayna ka badan 20 daqiiqo, oo ayna ka dheeraan 40 daqiiqo ardayda dugsiga sare.

sourceString: Preferably, the unit for primary school students should not be more than 20 minutes, and no longer than 40 minutes for secondary school students.
targetString: Abuurista xidhiidhka iyo kordhinta xidhiidhka: Abuurista xidhiidhka wax dhigista, waalidnimada, iyo maamulida dugsiyada ee ka jawaabida dareenka kalinimo ama raji beel, fududaynta wadaajiga khibrada iyo ka wada hadalka khidada loola tacaalayo marka ay timaado inay ku adkaato waxbarashu.

sourceString: Create communities and enhance connection: Create communities of teachers, parents, and school managers to address sense of loneliness or helplessness, facilitate sharing of experience and discussion on coping strategies when facing learning difficulties.
targetString: Arday 290 milyan ah ayaa ka maqan waxbarashadii COVID-19 dartiis: UNESCO waxa ay soo saartaa tiradii ugu horeysay ee caalamka oo waxayna diyaarisay jawaabta, UNECSO.

sourceString: 290 million students out of school due to COVID-19: UNESCO releases first global numbers and mobilizes response,   UNESCO.
targetString: Xakmaynta khatarta goobta shaqada ee COVID-19

sourceString: WHEREAS on March 4, 2020, I proclaimed a State of Emergency to exist in California as a result of the threat of COVID-19;
targetString: iyo HALKA mudo yar oo kooban COVID-19 aad ayuu ugu faafay California, taas oo looga baahan yahay in la cusboonaysiiyo iyo tilmaamo dheeraad ah oo la iskaga ilaaliyo oo laga heley saraakiisha caafimaadka shacabka federalka, gobolka, iyo deegaanka;

sourceString: and WHEREAS in a short period of time, COVID-19 has rapidly spread throughout California, necessitating updated and more stringent guidance from federal, state, and local public health officials;
targetString: iyo HALKA ilaalinta amaanka iyo caafimaadka shacabka iyada oo Gobolka California oo dhan ah, waxa aan u arkaa inay daruuri u tahay dhamaan reer California inay u fiirsadaan tilmaamaha caafimaadka shacabka Gobolka ee Waaxda Caafimaadka Shacabka.

sourceString: and WHEREAS for the preservation of public health and safety throughout the entire State of California, I find it necessary for all Californians to heed the State public health directives from the Department of Public Health.
targetString: IMINKA, MARKAA, ANIGA, GAVIN NEWSON, Badhasaabka Gobolka California, sida ay dhigayso awooda uu isiiyay Dastuurka Gobolka iyo shuruucda Gobolka California, gaar ahaan, Xeerka Dawlada qaybta 8567, 8627. iyo 8665 waxaan halkan soo saarayaa Amarka soo socda oo sida ugu dhakhsaha badan u dhaqan galaya.

sourceString: NOW, THEREFORE, I, GAVIN NEWSOM, Governor of the State of California, in accordance with the authority vested in me by the State Constitution and statutes of the State of California, and in particular, Government Code sections 8567, 8627, and 8665 do hereby issue the following Order to become effective immediately:
targetString: WAXAA MARKAA LA ARMAY IN:

sourceString: IT IS HEREBY ORDERED THAT:
targetString: 1) In la ilaaliyo caafimaadka iyo amaanka bulshada, oo la xiqiijiyo bixinta daryeelka caafimaad ee awooda u leh inuu u shaqeeyo cid walba, oo uu mudnaanta siiyo dadka khatarta badan ku jira ee nugul, dhamaan dadka deegaanka waxaa la amray inay sida dhakhsaha ah ula socdaan tilmaamahan caafimaadka shacabka Gobolka ee wakhtigan, kaas oo aan ku amnay Waaxda Caafimaadka Shacabka inay samayso xaalad gobolka oo dhan oo COVID-19 ah.

sourceString: 1) To preserve the public health and safety, and to ensure the healthcare delivery system is capable of serving all, and prioritizing those at the highest risk and vulnerability, all residents are directed to immediately heed the current State public health directives, which I ordered the Department of Public Health to develop for the current statewide status of COVID-19.
targetString: Tilmaamahani waxay ka kooban yihiin Maarso 19, 2020, Isfahankii Aqoonsiga Qaab Dhismeedka Muhiimka ah ee Shaqaalaha Daruuriga ah Inta Lagu Jiro Jawaab Celinta, COVID-19, oo laga heleyo: https://covid19.ca.goc/.

sourceString: Those directives are consistent with the March 19, 2020, Memorandum on Identification of Essential Critical Infrastructure Workers During COVID-19 Response, found at: https://covid19.ca.gov/.
targetString: AMARKA SARKAASHA CAAFIMAADKA SHACABKA CAAFIMAADKA

sourceString: ORDER OF THE STATE PUBLIC HEALTH OFFICER
targetString: Si loo ilaaliyo caafimaadka shacabka, Aniga oo ah Sarkaalka Caafimaadka Shacabka Gobolka iyo Haamulaha Waaxda Caafimaadka Shacabka California waxa aan ku amray dhamaan shakhsiyaadka degan Gobolka California inay joogaan guryahooda ama meesha ay degan yihiin marka laga tago inta loogu baahan yahay shaqooyinka daruuriga ah ee waaxaha dawlada federalka h u muhiimka ah, sida lagu sheegey https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors.

sourceString: To protect public health, I as State Public Health Officer and Director of the California Department of Public Health order all individuals living in the State of California to stay home or at their place of residence except as needed to maintain continuity of operations of the federal critical infrastructure sectors, as outlined at https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors.
targetString: Sidoo kale, iyada oo lagala tashano Maamulaha Xafiiska Badhasaabka ee Adeegyada Degdeg ah, waxa aan u wakiilan karaa waaxda dawlada ee muhiimka ah si markaa loo ilaaliyo caafimaadka iyo badqabka dhamaan dadka reer California.

sourceString: In addition, and in consultation with the Director of the Governor's Office of Emergency Services, I may designate additional sectors as critical in order to protect the health and well-being of all Californians.
