targetString: Waxyaabaha dheeraadka ah ee samaynta dawooyinka waxaa lagu taliyaa xadiga iyo jadwalka isticmaalka kowaad ee tijaabada bilaa aadanka ("markii kowaad ee bilaa aadanka" [FIH] ama Dawadii Ugu Horeysay ee Bilaa Aadanka [FHD], oo hore loogu yaqaabay "raga markii kowaad" [FIM]).

sourceString: A further major objective of drug development is to recommend the dose and schedule for the first use in a human clinical trial ("first-in-human" [FIH] or First Human Dose [FHD], previously also known as "first-in-man" [FIM]).
targetString: Sidoo kale, dawooyinka la sameeyay waa inay leeyihiin kiimiko cilmi nafsi oo NCE: waxa kiimikadeedu ka kooban yihiin, xasilinta, iyo xalka.

sourceString: In addition, drug development must establish the physicochemical properties of the NCE: its chemical makeup, stability, and solubility.
targetString: Warshadaha waa in looga faa'idaystaa nidaamka ay isticmaalayaan si ay u sameeyaan kiimikada si ay u miisaamaan kiimikada uu soo saarayao miligiraamkii, si loo sameeyo kiiloogiraamka iyo miisaanka sare.

sourceString: Manufacturers must optimize the process they use to make the chemical so they can scale up from a medicinal chemist producing milligrams, to manufacturing on the kilogram and ton scale.
targetString: Waxay sidoo kale sharaxeen alaabta ku haboon ee lagu mooriyo kaabsoosha, kiniinka, dhibcaha, irbada murqaha, irbada badhida, ama xididka dawada ah.

sourceString: They further examine the product for suitability to package as capsules, tablets, aerosol, intramuscular injectable, subcutaneous injectable, or intravenous formulations.
targetString: Nidaamyadan marka la isku daro, waxaa loo yaqaan tijaabada kahor iyo samaynta tijaabada keemistari ahaan, soo saar, iyo xakamayn (CMC). Dhinacyo badan oo samaynta dawada ah ayaa diirada lagu saaraa ku qanaca shuruudaha sharciga ee maamulka liisamada dawada.

sourceString: Together, these processes are known in preclinical and clinical development as chemistry, manufacturing, and control (CMC).Many aspects of drug development focus on satisfying the regulatory requirements of drug licensing authorities.
targetString: Kuwani waxay guud ahaan dhigaan tijaabada loogu talo geley in lagu ogaado sunta waawayn ee curiyaha novel kahor inta aan lagu isticmaalin bilaa aadanka.

sourceString: These generally constitute tests designed to determine the major toxicities of a novel compound prior to first use in humans.
targetString: Dawlada Kanada waxy ku dhawaaqdan CA $275 milyan oo deeq ah oo 96 mashruuc oo daraasadeed ah oo caafimaad oo lagaga jawaabayo COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan talaalo kala duwan oo jaamacaha Kanada ah, taas oo qorshaheedu yahay in la sameeyo "kayd talaal" oo talaalka cusub ee la dhaqan geliyay ah hadii safmar kale oo coronavirus ahi uu yimaado.

sourceString: The Canadian government announced CA$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian universities, with plans to establish a "vaccine bank" of new vaccines for implementation if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Dhawr barnaamij oo tijaabo oo markaa ku taxaluuqa sadex, dhawr sano wajigo ah oo ansixinta alaabta ah, iyo afar, waji oo marka la ansixiyo kadib ah oo la socodka amaanka talaalka ama dawooyinka daawaynta:

sourceString: Clinical trial programs involve three, multiple-year stages toward product approval, and a fourth, post-approval stage for ongoing safety monitoring of the vaccine or drug therapy:
targetString: Tijaabada wajiga I, waxaa lagu sameeyaa dad ikhtiyaarkood u ogolaaday oo caafimaad qaba, si loo ogaado xadiga iyo amaankeeda.

sourceString: Phase I trials, usually in healthy volunteers, determine safety and dosing.
targetString: Tijaabada wajiga II waxa loo isticmaalaa sidii loo samayn lahaa qaab diyaar garawga hore ah oo wax ku ool oo si dheeraad ahna loogu baadhi lahaa tirada yar ee dadka ee qaba xanuunka lagu bartilmaameedsado NCE.

sourceString: Phase II trials are used to establish an initial reading of efficacy and further explore safety in small numbers of people having the disease targeted by the NCE.
targetString: Tijaabada Wajiga III ee dadka badan, tijaabada muhiimiyada lagu ogaanayo amaanka iyo wax ku oolnimada dadka badan ee qaba safmarka COVID-19.

sourceString: Phase III trials are large, pivotal trials to determine safety and efficacy in sufficiently large numbers of people with the COVID-19 infection.
targetString: Hadii amaanka iyo wax ku oolnimada la xaqiijiyo, tijaabada dadka ayaa la joojin karaa markna oo NCE waxay galaysaa dhaqan gelinta dawada cusub (NDA) wajiga ah ee bilawga suuqgaynta.

sourceString: If safety and efficacy are adequately proved, clinical testing may stop at this step and the NCE advances to the new drug application (NDA) stage to begin marketing.
targetString: Tijaabada wajiga IV marka danbe ayaa la ansixiyaa taas oo ay noqon karto shuruudaha ay FDA ku lifaaqsay, oo loo yaqaan daraasada kormeerka suuqaynta kadib.

sourceString: Phase IV trials are post-approval trials that may be a condition attached by the FDA, also called post-market surveillance studies.
targetString: Marka laga tijaabada u baahan in talaalka novel ama dawada fayruska in la geeyo xarunta caafimaadka marka kowaad, warshahuhu waa inay xaqiijiyaan in sunta mudada dheer ah ama joogtada ah in sidoo kale loo bayaamiyaa si wanaagsan, oo ay ku jirto saamaynta nidaamka hore loogula socday (taranka, tarmida, nidaamka difaaca, iyo kuwo kale).

sourceString: In addition to the tests required to move a novel vaccine or antiviral drug into the clinic for the first time, manufacturers must ensure that any long-term or chronic toxicities are well-defined, including effects on systems not previously monitored (fertility, reproduction, immune system, among others).
targetString: Maraykanka, nidaamka waxaa loo yaqaan "dabaqaada dawada cusub" ama NDA.

sourceString: In the United States, this process is called a "new drug application" or NDA.
targetString: Tijaabada caafimaadka waxaa loo dejiyay sida hormarka looga sameeyo oo waxaa lagu samayn karaa wax ka badal "nashqad kale la qaato" hadii macluumaadka laga helyo ee tijaabadu ay sheegaan wixii wanaagsan ama xun ee wax ku oolka daawaynta.

sourceString: A clinical trial design in progress may be modified as an "adaptive design" if accumulating data in the trial provide early insights about positive or negative efficacy of the treatment.
targetString: Tikaabada Midawga caalmaka iyo Yurub ee dadka ku jira isbitaalka ee qaba xanuunka daran ee COVID-19 waxaa ka waajibo nashqada lala qabadsiinayo ee markaa aadka wax looga badalo qaabka tijaabada taas oo ka imanaysa afar khidadood oo tijaabada daawaynta ah.

sourceString: The global Solidarity and European Discovery trials of hospitalized people with severe COVID-19 infection apply adaptive design to rapidly alter trial parameters as results from the four experimental therapeutic strategies emerge.
targetString: Nashqadaha la qabsiga ee ka socdo Wajiga II-III ee tijaabada caafimaad ee inta u qalanka daawaynta waxaa lasoo gaabin karaan mudada tijaabada oo waxaa la isticmaali karaa dad yar, waxaan macquul ah in lasoo dadajiyo go'aanka in mar hore la joojiyo ama guusha ah, oo nashqada la isku keeney ee isbadalaysa ee tijaabada gaarka ah ee goobta caalamiga ah.

sourceString: Adaptive designs within ongoing Phase II-III clinical trials on candidate therapeutics may shorten trial durations and use fewer subjects, possibly expediting decisions for early termination or success, and coordinating design changes for a specific trial across its international locations.
targetString: Badanaa dawooyinka novel (NCEs) waxaa lagu guuldaraysaa marka la samaynayo, taas oo ah maadaama oo aan la aqbalin suntoona ama maadaama oo aan la xaqiijin inay waxtar leeyihiin xanuunka bartilmaameedka u ah, sida ku cad Wajiga II-III ee tijaaabada xarunta caafimaadka.

sourceString: Most novel drug candidates (NCEs) fail during drug development, either because they have unacceptable toxicity or because they simply do not prove efficacy on the targeted disease, as shown in Phase II-III clinical trials.
targetString: Xadiga sare ee ku guul daraysiga ah ee samaynta tijaabada dawada waxaa loola jeero " yaraynta xadiga", ee u baahan go'aanka wakhtiyada hore ee samaynta dawada si mar hore loo "joojiyo" mashruuca oo aan loo gelin kharash.

sourceString: The high failure rates associated with pharmaceutical development are referred to as an "attrition rate", requiring decisions during the early stages of drug development to "kill" projects early to avoid costly failures.
targetString: Hal daraasad oo 2010 lagu qiimanayay awooda iyo kharash lagu samaynayo hal dawo oo kaliya oo lagu suuqgaynayo oo ahaa ilaa US$1.8 bulyan iyo $870 milyan.

sourceString: One 2010 study assessed both capitalized and out-of-pocket costs for bringing a single new drug to market as about US$1.8 billion and $870 million, respectively.
targetString: Kharashka dawada waxaa lagu qiyaasay 2015-16 tijaabada 10 dawo oo kaansarka la dagaalama inay ahay $648 milyan.

sourceString: A median cost estimate of 2015-16 trials for development of 10 anti-cancer drugs was $648 million.
targetString: Naqdin lagu sameeyay 2016 106 dawo oo lagu qiimeeyay tijaabada xarunta caafimaadka, wada guud ee lagu bixiyay warshadaynta dawada la ansixiyay ee lagu guulaystay Wajiga III ee tijaabadu waxay ahayn $2.6 bilyan (2013 doolarka), xadiga oo kordha sanadkii xadi ah 8.5%.

sourceString: In a 2016 review of 106 drug candidates assessed through clinical trials, the total capital expenditure for a manufacturer having a drug approved through successful Phase III trials was $2.6 billion (in 2013 dollars), an amount increasing at an annual rate of 8.5%.
targetString: Dhawr tijaabo ayaa la wadaa oo dawooyinka dib loo isticmaali karo ah kuwaas oo hore loogu ansixiyay malaariyada, oo ay ku jiraan afar daraasadood oo hydroxychloroquine ama chloroquine phosphate.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating repurposed drugs already approved to treat malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine phosphate.
targetString: Dib u isticmaalka dawada fayruska waxa ay ah badanaa daraasada Jayniiska, kaas oo 9 Wajiga III ee tijaabada ah dib loo sameeyay dhawr dal oo markaa warbixintooda la sugayo dhamaadka Abriil.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with 9 Phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: Waxaa hogaaminaya Bill ana Melinda Gates Foundation oo cid ay gacan saar leeyihiin kuwaas oo maal galinaya US$125 milyan oo lana shaqaynaya Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka, Xawaaraynta Dawawaynta COVID-19 waxa uu bilaabmay Maarso, kuwaas oo fududeeyay daraasadaynta samaynta dawada si dhakhso loogu ogaado, qiimeeo, loo sameeyo, oo loo miisaao daawaynta mustaqbalka.

sourceString: Led by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation with partners investing US$125 million and coordinating with the World Health Organization, the COVID-19 Therapeutics Accelerator began in March, facilitating drug development researchers to rapidly identify, assess, develop, and scale up potential treatments.
targetString: Iskaashiga Daraasada Caafimaadka COVID-19 waxay samaysteen iskaashi iyo balaadhin natiijada ah oo tijaabada xarunta caafimaadka caalamiga ah ee dawooyinka la filanyo inay waxtar yeeshaan daawaynta kadib.

sourceString: The COVID-19 Clinical Research Coalition formed to coordinate and expedite results from international clinical trials on the most promising post-infection treatments.
targetString: Horaantii 2020, waxaa jiray curiyayaal fara badan oo dawada fayruska lagu samaynayay oo markaa lagu dawaynayay caabuqyada kale kaas oo dib loo isticmaalayo ama loo samaynayo dadaalka daraasada tijaabada cusub ee markaa lagu dawaynayo COVID-19.

sourceString: In early 2020, numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections were being repurposed or developed in new clinical research efforts to alleviate the illness of COVID-19.
targetString: Wixii dawooyinka hore loo ansixiyay ah (sida hydoxychloroquine ee maleeriyada), Wajiga Tijaabada III-IV waxaa lagu ogaanayaa boqolaal kun oo COVID-19 ah dad qaba oo ay macquul tahay inay isticmaalaan dawooyin hore loo ansixiyay si loogu daweeyo caabuqa COVID-19.

sourceString: For an already-approved drug (such as hydroxychloroquine for malaria), Phase III-IV trials determine in hundreds to thousands of COVID-19-infected people the possible extended use of an already-approved drug for treating COVID-19 infection.
targetString: Horaantii Abriil 2020, 103 daawayn ayaa la mariyay tijaabada kahor ama heerka Wajiga I-IV ee samaynta, taas oo tijaabadeedu keeney in 29 dawooyin ay u qalmaan intii lagu jiray Abriil.

sourceString: As of early April 2020, 103 candidate therapeutics were in preclinical or a stage of Phase I-IV development, with trial results for 29 drug candidates expected during April.
targetString: Maarso, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) waxay samaysay "tijaabo midaysan" oo ay iska kaashadeen 10 dal oo markaa lagu samaynayo tijaabada xanuunka COVID-19 ee dadka qaba ee haysta dawada fayruska lagula dagaalamo iyo waxyaabaha ololka la dagaalama oo aan markaa wali loogu qiimaynin si gaar ah xanuunka COVID-19.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization (WHO) launched the coordinated "Solidarity trial" in 10 countries to rapidly assess in thousands of COVID-19 infected people the potential efficacy of existing antiviral and anti-inflammatory agents not yet evaluated specifically for COVID-19 illness.
targetString: Miyay wax kamid ah dawooyinka yareeyaan dhimashada?

sourceString: Do any of the drugs reduce mortality?
targetString: Miyay wax kamid ah dawooyinku yareeyaan wakhtiga lagu jirayo isbitaalka?

sourceString: Do any of the drugs reduce the time a patient is hospitalized?
targetString: Miyay dawooyin wax ka taraan baahida bilaa aadanka ee ah in lagu yareeyo COVID-19-xanuunka sanbabka ee neefsiga ama in la helo daryeel sare?

sourceString: Do the treatments affect the need for people with COVID-19-induced pneumonia to be ventilated or maintained in intensive care?
targetString: Miyay dawada noocan ah loo isticmaali karaa si loogu yareeyo xanuunka COVID-19 ee shaqaalaha daryeelka caafimaadka iyo dadka ku jira khatarta badan ee inay yeeshaan ah xanuun adag? Dadka qaba caabuqa COVID-19 kaliya waxaa weeye in loo isticmaalo macluumaad gelinta, oo ay ku jiraan ogolaanshaha aan rasmiha ahayn, websaytka WHO.

sourceString: Could such drugs be used to minimize the illness of COVID-19 infection in healthcare staff and people at high risk of developing severe illness?Enrolling people with COVID-19 infection is simplified by using data entries, including informed consent, on a WHO website.
targetString: Kadib tijaabada shaqalaaha marka la go'aamiyo dawada waxaa la keeni doonaa isbitaalada, websaytka WHO ayaa si nasiib ah ulasoo bixi doona mid kamid ah dadka lagu tijaabiyo dawada ama isbitaalka caadiga ah ee bixiya daryeelka daawaynta COVID-19.

sourceString: After the trial staff determines the drugs available at the hospital, the WHO website randomizes the hospitalized subject to one of the trial drugs or to the hospital standard of care for treating COVID-19.
targetString: Dhakhtarka tijaabada wada ayaa duwaan gelin doona oo gudbin doona macluumaadka ku saabsan xaalada iyo daawaynta, waxa uu buuxin doonaa macluumaadka lagu gelinayo websaytka Loo Dhanyahay ee WHO.

sourceString: The trial physician records and submits follow-up information about the subject status and treatment, completing data input via the WHO Solidarity website.
targetString: Gudida la socodka amaanka ee caalamka ee dhakhaatiirta WHO ayaa baadhay natiijada kumeel gaadhka ah si ay uga caawiso go'aanka amaanka iyo wax ku oolnimada dawada tijaabada ah, oo waxa ay wax ka badaleen nashqada ama waxay ku taliyeen daawayn wax ku ool ah.

sourceString: A global safety monitoring board of WHO physicians examine interim results to assist decisions on safety and effectiveness of the trial drugs, and alter the trial design or recommend an effective therapy.
targetString: Websaytyada lamidka ah ee daraasada Midaysan, oo loo yaqaan "Ogaanshaha", waxa la bilaabay Maarso dhamaan todobada dal ee INSERM (Paris, Faransiiska). Intii lagu jiray Maarso, maalgelinta diyaarada Midaysan waxa ay gaadhay US $108 milyan oo laga heley 203,000 shakhsi, hay'adood iyo dawladood, oo 45 dal ay ka qayb galayaan maaliyada ama maamulida tijaabada.

sourceString: A similar web-based study to Solidarity, called "Discovery", was initiated in March across seven countries by INSERM (Paris, France).During March, funding for the Solidarity trial reached US$108 million from 203,000 individuals, organizations and governments, with 45 countries involved in financing or trial management.
targetString: Dawooyin badan oo macquul ah oo hoos yimaada daraasadan "tageero" ahaan si meesha looga saaro raaxo dawada xanuunka, sida NSAIDs ama bronchodilator, ayaa ku jira shaxda hoose.

sourceString: Numerous candidate drugs under study as "supportive" treatments to relieve discomfort during illness, such as NSAIDs or bronchodilators, are not included in the table below.
targetString: Heerarka kale ee Wajiga II ee tijaabada ama daawayno kale ee Wajiga I ee tijaabada, ayaa sidoo kale laga reebey.

sourceString: Others in early-stage Phase II trials or numerous treatment candidates in Phase I trials, are also excluded.
targetString: Dawooyinka loo qaatay Wajiga I-II tijaabada ah waxa ay leeyihiin guul yar (wax ka yar 12%) oo lagaga gudbo dhamaan wajiyada tijaabada ee markaa hadhaw la ansixin doono.

sourceString: Drug candidates in Phase I-II trials have a low rate of success (under 12%) to pass through all trial phases to gain eventual approval.
targetString: Hydroxychyloroquine waxa uu aad uga badan yahay chloroquine Maraykanka,

sourceString: Hydroxychloroquine is more commonly available than chloroquine in the United States.
targetString: In kasta oo dhawr dalk ay isticmaalaan chloroquine ama hydrpxchloroquine si ay ugu daweeyaan dadka dhakhtarta loo dhigay COVID-19, Maarso 2020 dawooyinka si rasmi ah looguma ansixin tijaabo caafimaadka Maraykanka.

sourceString: Although several countries use chloroquine or hydroxychloroquine for treatment of persons hospitalized with COVID-19, as of March 2020 the drug has not been formally approved through clinical trials in the United States.
targetString: Chloroquine waxa ku taliyay Jayna, Koonfurta Kuuriya, iyo Talyaaniga maamuladooda caafimaadka in lagu daweeyo COVID-19, in kasta oo   hay'adahan iyo CDC-da Maraykanku ay qoraal iskasoo horjeeda kasoo saareen dadka wadne xanuun ama macaanka qaba.

sourceString: Chloroquine has been recommended by Chinese, South Korean and Italian health authorities for the treatment of COVID-19, although these agencies and the US CDC noted contraindications for people with heart disease or diabetes.
targetString: Labada dawoba waxa ay si wayn ula dhax dhalaan dawooyinka la qoray, taas oo saamaynta xadida dawada iyo filashada xanuunka.

sourceString: Both drugs have extensive interactions with prescription drugs, affecting the therapeutic dose and disease mitigation.
targetString: Dadka qaar ayaa xasaasiyad ka qaaday dawooyinkan. Abriil 12, tijaabada caafimaad ee hore oo lagu sameeyay isbitaal ku yaala Brazil ayaa la joojiyay markii dhawr qof oo lasiiyay dawada chloroquine ee xanuunka COVID-19 ay yeesheen wadne garaac aan caadi ahayn, oo ay 11 u dhinteen.

sourceString: Some people have allergic reactions to these drugs.On 12 April, a preliminary clinical trial conducted at a hospital in Brazil was stopped when several people given high doses of chloroquine for COVID-19 infection developed irregular heart rates, causing 11 deaths.
targetString: Tijaabada caafimaadka Jayna ee Wuhan iyo Shenzhen waxaa lagu sheegey inay favipiravir ay si "cad wax u tartay".

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show that favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Bukaanada 35 kamid ah Shenzhen oo laga waayay 4 maalmood, halka mudada xanuunka uu noqday 11 maalmood 45 bukaanka oo aan qaadan.

sourceString: Of 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Daraasad lagu sameeyay Wugan 240 bukaan oo qaba xanuunada sanbabka kala badh waxaa la siiyay favipiravir kala badhna waxa ay qaateen umifenovir.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Weedha "daarasada hordhaca ah" waxaa lagu sheegaa daraasad shaybaadh oo vitro iyo vivo ah, taas oo muujinaysa wajiga bilawga ee samaynta talaalka, dawada fayruska ama daawaynta antiboodhiga monoclonal sida tijaabada lagu ogaanayao xadiga wax ku oolka ah iyo sunteeda, kahor inta aan lala soo bixin shayga la qiimaynayo amaanka iyo waxtarkeeda bilaa aadanka.

sourceString: The term "preclinical research" is defined by laboratory studies in vitro and in vivo, indicating a beginning stage for development of a vaccine, antiviral or monoclonal antibody therapy, such as experiments to determine effective doses and toxicity, before a candidate compound is advanced for safety and efficacy evaluation in humans.
targetString: Antiboodhiyada qaar ayaa u baahan kara in dib loogu isticmaalo daawaynta COVID-19:

sourceString: Some antibiotics may be repurposed as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: Maarso 2020, protease-ka guud ee fayruska SARS-CoV-2 waxaa lagu ogaaday in uu bartilmaameedsado dawada xanuunka kadib.

sourceString: In March 2020, the main protease of the SARS-CoV-2 virus was identified as a target for post-infection drugs.
targetString: Enzyme-kan waxa uu daruuri u yahay unuga qaabila si uu u soo saaro ribonuclein aysiidh ee fayruska.

sourceString: This enzyme is essential to the host cell to reproduce the ribonucleic acid of the virus.
targetString: Si aad u hesho enzyme, saynisyahanadu waxay isticmaalayaan genome ay soo saareen cilmi baadhayaasha Jayniiska Janaayo 2020 si ay usoos aaraan protease-ka guud.

sourceString: To find the enzyme, scientists used the genome published by Chinese researchers in January 2020 to isolate the main protease.
targetString: Dawo macquul ah oo la isku dari ahaan, waxa ay wada isticmaaleen iyada oo laba Waji III ah gacmaha 2020 ee mashruuca Midnimada caamaka ee COVID-19.

sourceString: As a potential combination therapy, they are used together in two Phase III arms of the 2020 global Solidarity project on COVID-19.
targetString: Daraasada hordhaca ah ee Jayna waxaa lagu daray lopinavir iyo ritonavir oo aan waxba u tarin dadkii isbitaalka loo dhigay COVID-19.

sourceString: A preliminary study in China of combined lopinavir and ritonavir found no effect in people hospitalized for COVID-19.
targetString: b' Dib u badalka makaanka dawada (oo sidoo kale loo yaqaan dib u isticmaalka, dib u baadhida, dib u shaqo gelinta ama badalka daawaynta) waxaa weeye dib u isticmaal dawo hore loo ansixiyay si loogu daweeyo xanuuno kala duwan ama mushkilado caafimaad oo kala duwan wixii marka hore loo sameeyay.

sourceString: It is unclear yet whether conditions arising during pregnancy including diabetes, cardiac failure, hypercoagulability or hypertension might represent additional risk factors for pregnant people as they do for nonpregnant people.From the limited data available, vertical transmission during the third trimester probably does not occur, or only occurs very rarely.
targetString: Ma jirto weli macluumaadka laga hayo uurka intiisa hore.

sourceString: There is no data yet on early pregnancy.
targetString: Cadaymo yar ayaa jirta oo lagu ogolaanayo wixii gunaanad wax ku ool ah ee nooca xanuunka COVID-19 ee dumarka uurka leh.

sourceString: Little evidence exists to permit any solid conclusions about the nature of COVID-19 infection in pregnancy.
targetString: Kiisaska aadka u daran 43 dumar ah oo ka yimid New York oo laga heley COVID-19 ayaa lagu arkay qaab lamid ah dumarka waawayn ee aan uurka lahayn: 86% waxau yeeshaan xanuun yar, 9.3% waxay yeesheen xanuun adag, oo 4.7% waxay yeesheen xanuun aad iyo aad u daran.

sourceString: A case series of 43 women from New York who tested positive for COVID-19 showed similar patterns to non-pregnant adults: 86% had mild disease, 9.3% had severe disease and 4.7% developed critical disease.
targetString: Dhimasho ayaa looga baqday laba.

sourceString: Fetal distress was reported in two.
targetString: Waxba kamid ah dumarka may yeelan xanuunka sanbabka oo daran oo COVID-19 ah ama dhiman.

sourceString: None of the women developed severe COVID-19 pneumonia or died.
targetString: Dhamaantood waxay dhaleen ilmo nool oo wax aad u daran oo neonatal asphyxia ah lagula arag.

sourceString: All of them had live birth pregnancies and no severe neonatal asphyxia was observed.
targetString: Muunad laga qaaday caanaha naaska, dheecaanka amniotic, dhiiga sudunta iyo cunaha candhuuf aha ayaa laga baadhay SARS-CoV-2, oo dhamaantoodna waa laga waayay. Daraasad kale oo lagu sameeyay 15 dumar ah oo uur leh, badanaa bukaanka waxaa ay lahaayeen xumad iyo qufac, halka shaybaadhkooda loo isticmaalay lymphoctopenia 12 bukaan.

sourceString: The samples of breast milk, amniotic fluid, cord blood and neonatal throat swab were tested for SARS-CoV-2, and all results were negative.In another study on 15 pregnant women, majority of the patients presented with fever and cough, while laboratory tests yielded lymphocytopenia in 12 patients.
targetString: Waxa lagu sameeyay shaybaadh tomography bukaankan kuwaas oo waxa ay lamid noqdeen bukaankii hore ee aan uurka laahyn, oo waxa ay ka koobnaayeen wakhtiyada hore opecities.

sourceString: Computed tomography findings of these patients were consistent with previous reports of non-pregnant patients, consisting of ground-glass opacities at early stage.
targetString: Sawir la socod ah kadib dhalmada waxa ay muujiyeen inaanu ku kordhin xanuunada sanbabku. Warbixin saxaafada ah ayaa sheegtey in wax ka badan 100 dumar ah oo qaba COVID-19 ay dhici karto inay dhaleen, oo Maarso 2020, lama sheegin wax dhimasho hooyo ah.

sourceString: Follow-up images after delivery showed no progression of pneumonia.Media reports indicate that over 100 women with COVID-19 might have delivered, and in March 2020, no maternal deaths were reported.
targetString: Tilmaamahani markaa waxay sheegayaan in dadka uurka leh ee la dhigo isbitaalka ee qaba COVID-19 ay tahay inay qaataan ugu yaraan 10 maalmood prophylactic miisaanka molokulaaradiisu yar yihiin oo heparin kadib marka ay ka baxaan isbitaalka.

sourceString: Their guidelines thus advise that any pregnant person admitted to hospital with a COVID-19 infection should receive at least 10 days of prophylactic low-molecular-weight heparin after being discharged from the hospital.
targetString: Mar jirto weli wax macluumaad ah oo sheegeysa in COVID-19 oo keeno mushkilad foosha ah.

sourceString: There are no data yet concerning the implications of COVID-19 infections for labour.
targetString: Ilmo yar oo gabadh ayay dhahsay hooyada qabta COVID-19 taas oo heerkeeda  IgM uu aad u sareeyay laba saacadood kadib dhalmada, taas oo muujinaysa in ay ka qaaday utero oo xoojinaysa inay jirto u gudbin mararka qaar.

sourceString: One infant girl born to a mother with COVID-19 had elevated IgM levels two hours after birth, suggesting that she had been infected in utero and supporting the possibility of vertical transmission in some cases.
targetString: Daraasad yar oo lagu sameeyay 6 dumar ah oo laga heley COVID-19 ayaa lagu sheegey inayna jirin wax SARS-COV-19 oo laga heley cunaha ilmaha markaa dhashay, ama serum laakiin antiboodhi ayaa laga heley dhiiga ilmaha muunada sera, oo ay ku jiraan IgM laba ilme.

sourceString: A small study involving 6 confirmed COVID-19 mothers showed no indication of SARS-COV-19 in their newborns' throats or serum but antibodies were present in neonatal blood sera samples, including IgM in two of the infants.
targetString: Maaha wax lala yaabo in hooyadu ay u gudbiso ilmaha markaa daraasd dheeraad ah ayaa lagu samaynaya si loo ogaado hadii fayruska mandheerta uu ka gudbay iyo hadii madheerta gacasha ee daraasada lagu samaynayaa ay waxyeelawday ama ayna caadi ahayn.

sourceString: This is not usually passed from mother to fetus so further research is required to know whether the virus crossed the placenta or whether placentas of women in the study were damaged or abnormal.
targetString: Maadaama oo COVID-19 uu leeyahay waxyaabo badan oo uu uga eeg yahay SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV, waxay u badan tahay in saamayntooda dumarka uurka lehi ay isku mid noqonayso.

sourceString: Since COVID-19 shows similarities to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, it is likely that their effect on pregnancy are similar.
targetString: Afarka kamid ah todoba dumar ah oo ku jiray qaybtii hore ee uurka ayuu kasoo dhacay ilmihii, laba kamid ah shan dumar ah ayuu xadidmay korniinka ilmahooda qaybta labaad ee uurka, iyo afar kamid ah shan dumar ah ayaa wakhti hore dhalay ilmihii.

sourceString: Four of seven had first trimester miscarriage, two of five had fetal growth restriction in the second trimester, and four of five had preterm birth.
targetString: Waxba caruurtaas may qabin SARS-CoV.

sourceString: None of the newborns were infected with SARS-CoV.
targetString: Warbixinta toban ruux oo uu ku dhacay MERS-CoV dumar uur leh Sucuudiga ayaa muujiyay jiritaanka caafimaad inuu kala duwan yahay, oo uu markaa yahay caabuq dhexe ilaa mid daran.

sourceString: A report of ten cases of MERS- CoV infection in pregnancy in Saudi Arabia showed that the clinical presentation is variable, from mild to severe infection.
targetString: Natiijada kasoo baxday waxay ahayn midii la doonayay badanaa, laakiin dhimashada ilmaha ayaa ahayd 27%. Qiimaynta dhawaan lagu sameeyay COVID-19 ayaad moodaa inuu khatartiisu kaga yar tahay hooyada iyo hooyada marka loo eego SARS iyo MERS laakiin waxaa kordhaysa khatarta in ilmuhu isaga oo aan gaadhin wakhtigiisa inuu dhasho wixii ka danbeeya todobaadka 28.

sourceString: The outcome was favorable in a majority of the cases, but the infant death rate was 27%.A recent review suggested that COVID-19 appeared to be less lethal to mothers and infants than SARS and MERS but that there may be an increased risk of preterm birth after 28 weeks' gestation.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka iyo Xarunta Kahortaga iyo Xakamaynta Xanuunada ee Maraykanka aaya kula talinaya dumarka uurka leh inay sameeyaan wax ay samaynayaan shacabku guud ahaan si ay iskaga ilaaliyaan caabuqa, inay afka iyo sanka xidhaan, inay iska ilaaliyaan la macaamilka dadka xanuunsanaya, inay ku farxashaan sabuun iyo biyo ama gacmo nadiifiye.

sourceString: The World Health Organization and  Centers for Disease Control and Prevention of the United States advises pregnant women to do the same things as the general public to avoid infection, such as covering cough, avoid interacting with sick people, cleaning hands with soap and water or sanitizer.
targetString: Daraasad lagu sameeyay Shanghai dumarka uurka leh oo ku jira qaybo kala duwan oo mudada uurka ah ayaa lagu sheegey inay baahi wayn u qabaan inay helaan macluumaadka caafimaadka oo online ah iyo adeegyo.

sourceString: A survey conducted in Shanghai among pregnant women in different trimesters of pregnancy identified a strong demand for online access to health information and services.
targetString: Dadka sugaya ilmahoodii kowaad ayaa diyaar u ahaa inay wada tashi iyo tilmaamo online ah helaan marka loo eego dadka hore usoo dhalay. RCOG iyo RCM waxay ku taliyeen in balamo la qabsado 7 maalmood kadib marka la yeesho calaamada xanuunka COVID-19 ama 14 maalmood hadii qof qoyska ahi uu leeyahay calaamado xanuun.

sourceString: People expecting their first baby were more willing to have online consultation and guidance than who had previously given birth.The RCOG and RCM recommend that in-person appointments be deferred by 7 days after the start of symptoms of COVID-19 or 14 days if another person in the household has symptoms.
targetString: Waxyaabo yar ayaa kusoo baxay sadex bukaan oo aan calaamado lahayn.

sourceString: Fever subsequently developed in three asymptomatic patients.
targetString: Hal bukaan oo laga waayay ayaa markii danbe yeeshan astaamo markii danbe ah kaas oo markii danbe laga heley sadex maalmood kadib markii shaybaadhkii kowaad lagaga waayay.

sourceString: One patient who had tested negative subsequently became symptomatic postpartum and tested positive three days after the initial negative test.
targetString: Dhakhtarada sameeyay shaybaadhku waxa ay ku taliyeen si loo yareeyo caabuqa oo loo helo PPE, maadaama oo tirobadan oo bukaan ahi ayna lahayn wax calaamado ah, shaybaadh guud oo dumarka uur leh in lagu sameeyo.

sourceString: The doctors conducting the screening recommended that in order to reduce infection and allocate PPE, due to high numbers of patients presenting as asymptomatic, universal screening of pregnant patients should be conducted.
targetString: Waxay sidoo kale ku taliyeen in dadka looga shakiyo ama lagu xaqiijiyo inay qabaan COVID-19 inay sii wadaan la socodka elektoroonig ahaan ee ilmaha.

sourceString: They also suggest that people with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 should have continuous electronic fetal monitoring.
targetString: Isticmaalka barkada dhalma laguma talinayo wixii dad ah ee looga shakiyo ama la xaqiijiyo inay qabaan COVID-19 maadaama oo khatar badan oo xanuun ahi ay ka iman karto.

sourceString: The use of birthing pools is not recommended for suspected or confirmed cases of COVID-19 due to the risk of infection via faeces.
targetString: Ingiriiska, saraakiishu waxay ku taliyaan in taxadir ahaan in hooyada iyo ilmaha la kala kaxeeyo ee caafimaad qabka ku dhasha taas oo ay tahay in aan la dhayalsan oo ay tahay in meel lagu wada hayo mudada dhalmada kadib inta daryeelka ilmaha aan loo baahnayn. Macluumaadka Jayna laga heleyo ayaa sheegaya in laga kaxeeyo hooyada qabka ilmaha 14 maalmood.

sourceString: In the UK, official recommendations state that precautionary separation of a mother and a healthy baby should not be undertaken lightly and that they should be kept together in the postpartum period where neonatal care is not required.Literature from China recommended separation of infected mothers from babies for 14 days.
targetString: Maraykanka waxaa sidoo kale jira talooyin lamid ah oo ilmaha cusub iyo hooyada ay tahay in si kumeel gaadh ah loo kala kaxeeyo ilaa inta uu ay meesha ka baxayso taxadirka isku gudbinta, iyo marka ayna macquulka ahayn ilmaha cusub in 2 mitir loo jirsiiyo hooyada.

sourceString: In the US there is also the recommendation that newborns and mothers should be temporarily separated until transmission-based precautions are discontinued, and that where this is not possible the newborn should be kept 2 metres away from the mother.
targetString: b' Basaasida COVID-19 waxaa ka mid aha la socodka faafitaanka xanuunka coronavirus si markaa loo ogaado qaabka uu ku faafayo.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 surveillance involves monitoring the spread of the coronavirus disease in order to establish the patterns of disease progression.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) waxay ku talinaysaa la socodka firfircoon, taas oo diirada lagu saarayo natiijada, shaybaadhka iyo daba galka meesha laga qaaday ee dhamaan xaalada isu gudbinta.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends active surveillance, with focus of case finding, testing and contact tracing in all transmission scenarios.
targetString: La socodka aadka u balaadhan ee COVID-19 ayaa la filanayaa in lagula socdo qaabka faafitaanka, in lagula socdo kiisaska cusub, iyo iyada oo laga duulayo macluumaadkan, in la helo macluumaadka faafitaanka oo markaa lagu sameeyo qiimaynta khatarta iyo tilmaamaha u diyaar garawga xanuunka.

sourceString: COVID-19 surveillance is expected to monitor epidemiological trends, rapidly detect new cases, and based on this information, provide epidemiological information to conduct risk assessment and guide disease preparedness.
targetString: Kormeerka astaamaha ayaa ku salaysan calaamadaha shakhsiga ee markaa u dhigma kuwa COVID-19.

sourceString: Syndromic surveillance is done based on the symptoms of an individual that corresponds to COVID-19.
targetString: Maarso 2020, WHO waxay ku talisay in kiisaska soo socda la bayaamiyo:

sourceString: As of March 2020, the WHO recommends the following case definitions:
targetString: Macquul ah inuu qabo: "Cidii laga shakiyo ee laga baadhay fayruka COVID-19 ee natiijadeedu ayna dhamaystirnayn "AMA" cidii laga shakiyo ee shaybaadhka aan lagu samaynin waxay doonto ha noqotee sababtu".

sourceString: Probable case : "A suspect case for whom testing for the COVID-19 virus is inconclusive" OR "a suspect case for whom testing could not be performed for any reason".
targetString: Cida la xaqiijiyo inay qabto: "Qofka uu shaybaadh xaqiijiyay inuu qabo COVID-19, iyada oo aan la eegeynin calaamadaha iyo ishaarada xanuun ee uu leeyahay".

sourceString: Confirmed case: "A person with laboratory confirmation of COVID-19 infection, irrespective of clinical signs and symptoms".
targetString: Isku soo dhawaanshaha tooska ah ee cida ay dhigi karto ama la xaqiijiyo inay qabto;

sourceString: Direct physical contact with a probable or confirmed case;
targetString: Inta loo adeegayo bukaanka ay dhici karto ama la xaqiijiyo inuu qabo COVID-19 iyada oo aan la isticmaalin agabka badbaadada ee munaasabka ah.

sourceString: Direct care for a patient with probable or confirmed COVID-19 disease without using proper personal protective equipment;
targetString: Xaaladaha kale ayaa muujinaya in qiimaynta khatarta ee deegaanka". WHO waxay ku talinaynaa in la sheego wixii looga shakiyo iyo kuwa la xaqiijiyo inay qabaan COVID-19 48 saacadood gudahood marka la ogaado.

sourceString: Other situations as indicated by local risk assessments".WHO recommends reporting of probable and confirmed cases of COVID-19 infection within 48 hours of identification.
targetString: Dalalku waa in ay kiis-kiis u sheegaan ilaa inta macquulka ah, laakiin hadii ay jirto yaraan khayraadka ahi, waxaa loo baahan yahay warbixin todobaadkii oo la isku daro hadii ay macquul tahay.

sourceString: The countries should report on a case-by-case basis as far as possible, but in case of limitation in resources, aggregate weekly reporting is also possible.
targetString: Hay'adaha qaar ayaa sameeyay app-ka dhaqaale lagu uruurinayo oo lagula soconayo calaamadaha, halkaas oo dadku ay soo sheegi karaan calaamadaha ay leeyihiin si ay cilmi baadhayaasha uga caawiyaan khariirad samaynta aagaga uu ku badan yahay calaamadaha COVID-19.

sourceString: Some organizations have created crowdsourced apps for syndromic surveillance, where people can report their symptoms to help researchers map areas with concentration of COVID-19 symptoms.
targetString: Kormeerka fayryska ayaa lagu sameeyay iyada oo la isticmaalkayo shaybaadhka molokulaarada ee COVID-19.

sourceString: Virological surveillance is done by using molecular tests for COVID-19.
targetString: WHO waxay baahisay macluumaad ku saabsan shaybaadhada sida loo sameynayo shaybaadhak COVID-19.

sourceString: WHO has published resources for laboratories on how to perform testing for COVID-19.
targetString: Midawga Yurub, shaybaadhadu waxay xaqiijiyeen in kiisaska COVID-19 lagu sheego 24 saacadood marka la ogaado.

sourceString: In the European Union, laboratory confirmed cases of COVID-19 are reported within 24 hours of identification.
targetString: Ugu yaraan 24 dal ayaa sameeyay la socod dhitaal ah oo dadkooda ah.

sourceString: At least 24 countries have established digital surveillance of their citizens.
targetString: La socodka dhitaalka ah waxaa kamid ah app-baba, macluumaadka goobta iyo sumadayn elektoroonig ahaan.

sourceString: The digital surveillance technologies include apps, location data and electronic tags.
targetString: Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Kahortaga Xanuunada Maraykanka ayaa la socota macluumaadka socdaalka ee shakhsiyaadka iyada oo isticmaalaysa macluumaadka rakaabka diyaaradaha.

sourceString: The Center For Disease Control and Prevention in USA tracks the travel information of individuals using airline passenger data.
targetString: Hong Kong, maamulka waxa ay ku waajibeen gacan xidhad iyo app inay samaystaan dhamaan dadka socdaalayaayi.

sourceString: In Hong Kong, authorities are requiring a bracelet and an app for all travellers.
targetString: App GPS ah ayaa loo isticmaalaa si loola socdo shakhsiyaadka Koonfurta Kuuriya si loo xaqiijiyo in aan karantiimada la jabin, kas oo digniin u dira isticmaalayaasha iyo maamulka hadii ay ka tabaan aagii loogu talo geley.

sourceString: A GPS app is used to track the locations of individuals in South Korea to ensure against quarantine breach, sending alerts to the user and to authorities if people leave designated areas.
targetString: Singaaboor, shakhsiyaadku waa inay sheegaan meesha ay ku sugayn yihiin iyaga oo isticmaalaya cadayn sawir leh.

sourceString: In Singapore, individuals have to report their locations with photographic proof.
targetString: Taylan waxay isticmaashaa app iyo kaadhka SIM-ka si ay dadka socdaalayaa ay u dhaqan geliyaan karantiimada.

sourceString: Thailand is using an app and SIM cards for all travelers to enforce their quarantine.
targetString: Hay'ada xuquuqda bilaa aadanka ayaa dhaleeceeyay talaabooyinkan, kuwaas oo ka dalbaday dawladaha inayna u isticmaalin safmarka inay keenaan qaab balaadhan oo lagula socoto dadka dhitaal ahaan.

sourceString: Human rights organizations have criticized some of these measures, asking the governments not to use the pandemic as a cover to introduce invasive digital surveillance.
targetString: b' Talaalka COVID-19 waxa weeye mala awaal talaal coronavirus xanuunka 2019 (COVID-19).

sourceString: b'Coronaviruses are a group of related viruses that cause diseases in mammals and birds.
targetString: Bilaa aadanka, coronavirus waxa uu ku keenaa mushkilad neefsiga ah kaas oo noqon kara mid ama mid adag.

sourceString: In humans, coronaviruses cause respiratory tract infections that can range from mild to lethal.
targetString: Xanuunka yar waxaa kamid ah hargab (kaas oo waxyeebo kale keeni karaa, badanaa fayruska rhino), halka kuwa aadka u daran ay keeni karaan SARS, MERS, iyo COVID-19.

sourceString: Mild illnesses include some cases of the common cold (which has other possible causes, predominantly rhinoviruses), while more lethal varieties can cause SARS, MERS, and COVID-19.
targetString: Calaamdaaha kale ee noocyada kala duwan, digaaga, waxa ay keenaan xanuunka neefsiga oo qaybta sare ah, halka lo'da iyo doofaarka ay keenaan shuban.

sourceString: Symptoms in other species vary: in chickens, they cause an upper respiratory tract disease, while in cows and pigs they cause diarrhea.
targetString: Waxaa weli la raadinayaa talaalka ama dawada fayruska ee lagaag hortagi karo caabuqa fayruska bilaa aadanka.

sourceString: There are yet to be vaccines or antiviral drugs to prevent or treat human coronavirus infections.
targetString: Coronavirus uu ka yimid qoyska Orthecoronavirinae, ee Coronaviridae, iyo Nidovirales, iyo ka dib loo ogaaday ee Riboviria.

sourceString: Coronaviruses constitute the subfamily Orthocoronavirinae, in the family Coronaviridae, order Nidovirales, and realm Riboviria.
targetString: Waxaa weeye xidhmo fayrusyo ah oo maraa leh dareen isku mid ah oo RNA genome iyo nucleocapsid leh ee helical symmetry.

sourceString: They are enveloped viruses with a positive-sense single-stranded RNA genome and a nucleocapsid of helical symmetry.
targetString: Cabirka genome ee kala duwan ee coronavirus oo ah celcelis ahaan 26 ilaa 32 kiiloobaas, halka ugu wayn ee fayruska RNA.

sourceString: The genome size of coronaviruses ranges from approximately 26 to 32 kilobases, one of the largest among RNA viruses.
targetString: Waxa ay leeyihiin qaab falaadho oo markaa ka yimaada dusha, kaas oo ah micrographs lagu sameeyay sawirka u eeg solar corona kaas oo ah halka uu magucu ka yimid.

sourceString: They have characteristic club-shaped spikes that project from their surface, which in electron micrographs create an image reminiscent of the solar corona from which their name derives.
targetString: Coronavirus waxaa markii ugu horeeyay la ogaaday 1930yaadkii markii uu xanuunka daran ee neefsiga oo harqiyay digaaga kaas oo la ogaaday inuu keeno caabuq fayrus (IBV).

sourceString: Coronaviruses were first discovered in the 1930s when an acute respiratory infection of domesticated chickens was shown to be caused by infectious bronchitis virus (IBV).
targetString: Sanadihii 1940yaadkii, laba coronavirus oo kale oo xayawaan, fayruska jooniska jiirka (MHV) iyo faryuska neefsiga ee isku gudbi kara (TGEV), ayaa la ogaaday. Coronavirus-ka bilaa aadanka waxaa la ogaaday 1960.

sourceString: In the 1940s, two more animal coronaviruses, mouse hepatitis virus (MHV) and transmissible gastroenteritis virus (TGEV), were isolated.Human coronaviruses were discovered in the 1960s.
targetString: Daraasada ugu horeeyay ee lagu ogaaday bukaanka bilaa aadanka waxa uu ahaa hargabka, kaas oo markii danbe lagu sheegey coronavirus 229E iyo coronaviruska bilaa aadanka ee OC43.

sourceString: The earliest ones studied were from human patients with the common cold, which were later named human coronavirus 229E and human coronavirus OC43.
targetString: Waxaa markii ugu horeysay sawiray khabiirka fayrusyada Iskootlan June Almeida ee Isbitaalka St. Thomas ee London.

sourceString: They were first imaged by Scottish virologist June Almeida at St. Thomas Hospital in London.
targetString: Wixii ka danbeeyay waxaa la ogaaday coronavirusyo kale, oo ay ku jiraan SARS-CoV 2003, HCoV NL63 2004, HKU1 2005, MERS-CoV 2012, IYO SARS-CoV-2 2019.

sourceString: Other human coronaviruses have since been identified, including SARS-CoV in 2003, HCoV NL63 in 2004, HKU1 in 2005, MERS-CoV in 2012, and SARS-CoV-2 in 2019.
targetString: Badankoodu waxay leeyihiin xanuuno neefsiga oo daran.

sourceString: Most of these have involved serious respiratory tract infections.
targetString: Waxaa magaca markii ugu horeysay la isticmaalay 1968 oo waxaa isticmaalay koox khabiiro fayrusyada ah oo ku qoray wargeysa Nature oo kula sheegey inuu yahay qoys cusub oo fayrusyada ah.

sourceString: The name was first used in 1968 by an informal group of virologists in the journal Nature to designate the new family of viruses.
targetString: Magaca waxaa loola jeedaa qaabka muuqaalka virion (qaabka caabuqa ee fayruska) ee waynaysada elektron-ka, taas oo wayn, buufin oo kae ah dusha oo sameeya sawirta sida taashka boqorada iyo solar corona oo kale.

sourceString: The name refers to the characteristic appearance of virions (the infective form of the virus) by electron microscopy, which have a fringe of large, bulbous surface projections creating an image reminiscent of a crown or of a solar corona.
targetString: Morphologyga noocan ah waxaa lagu sameeyay peplomers kordahy, kaas oo borootiinka dusha ee fayruska ah.

sourceString: This morphology is created by the viral spike peplomers, which are proteins on the surface of the virus.
targetString: Coronavirus waxa uu leeyahay falaadho waawayn gaar ahaan buufino dusha ah oo la saadaaliyay.

sourceString: Coronaviruses are large pleomorphic spherical particles with bulbous surface projections.
targetString: Samaysanka fayruskan waxa aad moodaa mikoroogiraaf gaar ah oo cufka qolofta elektronska. Xidhmada fayruska waxa ay ka kooban tahay lipid laba lakab ah halka xabka (m), xidhmo (E) iyo korodh (S) qaab borootiino ah ayaa ku jira.

sourceString: The envelope of the virus in electron micrographs appears as a distinct pair of electron dense shells.The viral envelope consists of a lipid bilayer where the membrane (M), envelope (E) and spike (S) structural proteins are anchored.
targetString: Xidhmada lipid ee labada lakab ah, borootiinka xabka, iyo nucleocapsid ayaa ka ilaaliya fayruska marka uu banaanka ka joogo unugii uu ku dhax noolaa.

sourceString: The lipid bilayer envelope, membrane proteins, and nucleocapsid protect the virus when it is outside the host cell.
targetString: Coronavirus waxa uu leeyahay dareen boositif ah, waa hal miiq oo RNA genome ah.

sourceString: Coronaviruses contain a positive-sense, single-stranded RNA genome.
targetString: Cabirka genome ee coronavirus waxa uu ka kooban yahay 26.4 ilaa 31.7 kiloobaas.

sourceString: The genome size for coronaviruses ranges from 26.4 to 31.7 kilobases.
targetString: Cabirka genome waxaa weeye mid kamid ah kuwa ugu dheer ee RNA fayrusyada.

sourceString: The genome size is one of the largest among RNA viruses.
targetString: Fireenka u furan akhriska ee 1a iyo 1b, kaas oo ay ku jiraan gemo kowaad labaadsadexaad, waxa uu leeyahay replicase/transcriptase polyprotein.

sourceString: The open reading frames 1a and 1b, which occupy the first two-thirds of the genome, encode the replicase/transcriptase polyprotein.
targetString: Replicase/transcriptase polyprotein waxa uu iskii u galaa qaabka wixii aan borootiinta qaabaysnayn ah. Fireemka akhriska danbe ee lagu daray borootiinta afarta ah ee waawayn: korodhka, bushqada, xabka, iyo nucleocapsid.

sourceString: The replicase/transcriptase polyprotein self cleaves to form nonstructural proteins.The later reading frames encode the four major structural proteins: spike, envelope, membrane, and nucleocapsid.
targetString: Meesha ay iskugu yimaadaan fireemyadan akhriska ah waxaa weeye akhri fireemyo ah oo loogu baahan yahay borootiinta.

sourceString: Interspersed between these reading frames are the reading frames for the accessory proteins.
targetString: Tirada borootiinta uu kasoo fircamo iyo shaqadoodu waxay gaar u tahay oo ay ku xidhay tahay faryuska gaarka ah.

sourceString: The number of accessory proteins and their function is unique depending on the specific coronavirus.
targetString: Waxa uu bilaabaa xanuun qaadsiinta marka uu kordho (S) fayruska glycoprotein-ta weerarta unuga uu ku dhax nool yahay ee ay is qaataan.

sourceString: Infection begins when the viral spike (S) glycoprotein attaches to its complementary host cell receptor.
targetString: Kadib lifaaqa, protease-ka unuga uu ku nool yahay ayaa kala qaybsama oo bilaaba inuu firfircoonaado qaata ku lifaaqan ku tarma borootiinta.

sourceString: After attachment, a protease of the host cell cleaves and activates the receptor-attached spike protein.
targetString: Iyada oo ku xidhan protease-ka unuga uu ku nool yahay, qaybsanka iyo firfircoonidu waay u faylaysaa fayruska inuu galo unuga uu ku nool yahay endocytosisi-ka ama uu toos u galo xidhmada fayruska ee xabka unuga uu ku dhax nool yahay. Marka uu galo unuga uu ku dhax nool yahay, fayrusku waxa uu bilaabaa inuu quub dhaxsado, oo genome-kiigsa ayaa gala cytoplasm-ka unuga.

sourceString: Depending on the host cell protease available, cleavage and activation allows the virus to enter the host cell by endocytosis or direct fusion of the viral envelop with the host membrane.On entry into the host cell, the virus particle is uncoated, and its genome enters the cell cytoplasm.
targetString: Unuga uu ku dhax nool yahay ribosome-kiisa ayaa isku badala dul saarka kaas oo fura akhriska fireemka fayruska genome iyo qaababka polyprotein-ka mudada dheer.

sourceString: The host ribosome translates the initial overlapping open reading frame of the virus genome and forms a long polyprotein.
targetString: Polyprotein waxa uu leeyahay protease kiisa u gaarka ah kaas oo u qaybiya polyprotein-ka borootiino badan oo aan qaabaysnayn.

sourceString: The polyprotein has its own proteases which cleave the polyprotein into multiple nonstructural proteins.
targetString: Borootiinta badan ee aan qaabaysnayn ayaa isku timaada oo samaysa botiin badan oo replicase-transcriptase murugsan (RTC).

sourceString: A number of the nonstructural proteins coalesce to form a multi-protein replicase-transcriptase complex (RTC).
targetString: Borootiinka ugu ywan ee replicase transcriptase waa RNA waxay ku xidhan tahay RNA polymerase (RdRp).

sourceString: The main replicase-transcriptase protein is the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp).
targetString: Waxa ay si toos ah ugu taxaluuqdaa badalka iyo ka samaynta RNA ee xadhkaha RNA.

sourceString: It is directly involved in the replication and transcription of RNA from an RNA strand.
targetString: Borootiinta kale ee aan qaabaysnayn waxaa weeye kaalmada murugsan ee u eeg iyo nidaamka transcription.

sourceString: The other nonstructural proteins in the complex assist in the replication and transcription process.
targetString: Exoribonuclease-ka borootiinta aan qaabaysanyn, tusaale ahaan, waxa uu bixiyaa arbush dheeraad ah oo replication kaas oo bixiya akhriska shaqada RNA ku tiirsan RNA polymersade yaraanta. Halka shaqo ee ugu wayn ee murugsanaanta waxaa weeye in la sameeyo genome-ga fayruska.

sourceString: The exoribonuclease nonstructural protein, for instance, provides extra fidelity to replication by providing a proofreading function which the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase lacks.One of the main functions of the complex is to replicate the viral genome.
targetString: RdRp waxa uu si toos ah u dhexaadiyaa samaynta dareenka negatifka ah ee genomic RNA ee dareenka boositifka genomic RNA.

sourceString: RdRp directly mediates the synthesis of negative-sense genomic RNA from the positive-sense genomic RNA.
targetString: Taasi waxaa ku xidha taranka dareenka boositifka ah ee genomic RNA ee ka yimid dareenka negetifka ah ee genomic RNA.

sourceString: This is followed by the replication of positive-sense genomic RNA from the negative-sense genomic RNA.
targetString: Shaqada kale ee muhiimka ah ee murugsan waa qoraala genome-ga fayruska.

sourceString: The other important function of the complex is to transcribe the viral genome.
targetString: RdRp waxa ay si toos ah u maamushaa samaysanka sareenka negatifka ee qaybta hoosaadka genomic RNA molokuyuulada ah ee ka yimid dareenka boositifka ah ee genomic ee RNA.

sourceString: RdRp directly mediates the synthesis of negative-sense subgenomic RNA molecules from the positive-sense genomic RNA.
targetString: Waxaa taas daba socda qroaalka dareenka negatifka ah ee genomic ee qaybta hoosaaska ah ee RNA ee molokuulada ee mRNAs dareenka wanaagsan ee u dhigma.

sourceString: This is followed by the transcription of these negative-sense subgenomic RNA molecules to their corresponding positive-sense mRNAs.
targetString: Taranka dareenka boositifka ah ee genomic RNA ayaa nocda genome ee fayruksa progeny,

sourceString: The replicated positive-sense genomic RNA becomes the genome of the progeny viruses.
targetString: mRNAs waxaa weeye qoraal hide sadah aah oo sadexda danbe ee genome fayruska kadib marka markii hore uu dul saarmay nidaamka akhriska.

sourceString: The mRNAs are gene transcripts of the last third of the virus genome after the initial overlapping reading frame.
targetString: mRNAs yadaas waxaa loo turjubaa ribosomes-yada unuga uu ku dhax nool yahay oo ah qaab borootiin iyo tirada uu kasoo jeedo borootiintu.

sourceString: These mRNAs are translated by the host's ribosomes into the structural proteins and a number of accessory proteins.
targetString: RNA turjubaadiisa ayaa timaada gudaha endoplasmic reticulum.

sourceString: RNA translation occurs inside the endoplasmic reticulum.
targetString: Qaabka borootiinta fayruska S, E, iyo M ayaa la socota dhabada xogta ee Golgi qaybintiisa dhexe.

sourceString: The viral structural proteins S, E, and M move along the secretory pathway into the Golgi intermediate compartment.
targetString: Halkaas, borootiinta M ayaa hagta badanaa borootiinta-isdhaxgalka borootiintu waxay u baahan tahay samaysan fayruska oo uu la socdo isku darsanka nucleocapsid.

sourceString: There, the M proteins direct most protein-protein interactions required for assembly of viruses following its binding to the nucleocapsid.
targetString: Fayruska progeny ayaa kadibna sii daaya unuga uu ku dhax nool yahay ee exocytosis kaas oo dhax mara xididada cida sida.

sourceString: Progeny viruses are then released from the host cell by exocytosis through secretory vesicles.
targetString: Isdhaxgalka korodhka borootiinta coronavirus waxa ay xoojisaa qaadaha unuga ee dhexe si loogu ogaado tropism-ka unuga, iyo noocyada kala duwan ee fayruska.

sourceString: The interaction of the coronavirus spike protein with its complement host cell receptor is central in determining the tissue tropism, infectivity, and species range of the virus.
targetString: Coronavirus-ka SARS tusaale ahaan, waxa uu galaa unuga bilaa aadanka isaga oo ku lifaaqaya angiotensin-loo badeley enzyme 2 (ACE2) qaabilaha ah.

sourceString: The SARS coronavirus, for example, infects human cells by attaching to the angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) receptor.
targetString: Magaca sayniska ee coronavirus waa Orthocoronavirinae ama Coronavirinae.

sourceString: The scientific name for coronavirus is Orthocoronavirinae or Coronavirinae.
targetString: Coronavirus-yadu waxay ka tirsan yihiin qoyska Coronaviridae, amarka Nidovirales, iyo digniinta Riboviria.

sourceString: Coronaviruses belong to the family of Coronaviridae, order Nidovirales, and realm Riboviria.
targetString: Genus Betacoronavirus; nooca noocyada: Murine coronavirus

sourceString: Genus Betacoronavirus; type species: Murine coronavirus
targetString: Noocyada: Betacoronavirus 1 (Bovine Coronavirus, Coronavirus-ka Bilaa Aadanka OC43), Coronaviruska bilaa aadanka HKU1, Murine coronavirus, Pipistrellus coronaviruska fiidmeerta HKU5, Rousettus coronaviruska diifmeerta HKU9, Xanuunka neefsiga ee aadka u daran ee la xidhiidha coronavirus (SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2), Tylonycteris coronaviruska fiidmeerta HKU4, Xanuunka neefka ee barida dhexe ee la xidhiidha coronavirus, Hedgehog coronavirus 1 (EriCoV)

sourceString: Species: Betacoronavirus 1 (Bovine Coronavirus, Human coronavirus OC43), Human coronavirus HKU1, Murine coronavirus, Pipistrellus bat coronavirus HKU5, Rousettus bat coronavirus HKU9, Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2), Tylonycteris bat coronavirus HKU4, Middle East respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus, Hedgehog coronavirus 1 (EriCoV)
targetString: Noocyada: Bulega whale ee coronavirus SW1, Fayruska xanuunka ololka cunaha

sourceString: Species: Beluga whale coronavirus SW1, Infectious bronchitis virus
targetString: Nooca ugu danbeeyay ee uu kasoo farcamay (MRCA) ee dhaman coronavirusyada waxaa lagu qiyaasay inuu jiray ilaa 8000 kahor dhalashada ciise, in kasta oo noocyada qaar ay ka dhigaan faracankiisa ilaa 55 milyan oo sano ama wax ka badan, taas oo muujinaysa isasoo badal mudo dheer ah oo fiidmeerta iyo hargabka shimbirada.

sourceString: The most recent common ancestor (MRCA) of all coronaviruses is estimated to have existed as recently as 8000 BCE, although some models place the common ancestor as far back as 55 million years or more, implying long term coevolution with bat and avian species.
targetString: Ka ugu caansan ee uu kasoo firmacay alphacoronavirus laynka ah waxaa laga dhigay inuu yahay 2400 dhalashaca ciise kahor, coronaviruska fiidmeerta khadka ahi waa 3300 oo sano dhalashada Ciise kahor, gammacoronavirus khadka ah waxaa weeye 2800 sano dhalashada Ciise kahor, iyo deltacoronavirus khadka ah waxaa weeye ilaa 3000 oo sano dhalashada ciise kahor.

sourceString: The most recent common ancestor of the alphacoronavirus line has been placed at about 2400 BCE, the betacoronavirus line at 3300 BCE, the gammacoronavirus line at 2800 BCE, and the deltacoronavirus line at about 3000 BCE.
targetString: Tirada ugu badan ee fiidmeerta qaadi karta iyo noocyada hargabka shimbirada, way kala duwan yihiin, oo waxa ay soo mareen isbadalo badan iyo qaybin coronavirus. Bilaa coronavirus-ka aadan badanka badanaa waxa uu kasoo jeedaa fiidmeerta.

sourceString: The large number of host bat and avian species, and their global range, has enabled extensive evolution and dissemination of coronaviruses.Many human coronavirus have their origin in bats.
targetString: Dhawaan, coronavirus-ka alpaca iyo coronavirus-ka bilaa aadanka 229E ayaa lala baxay wixii ka horeeyay 1960.

sourceString: More recently, alpaca coronavirus and human coronavirus 229E diverged sometime before 1960.
targetString: MERS-CoV ayaa soo baxay oo bilaa aadanka oo ka yimid fiidmeerta taas oo marka hore soo martay geela.

sourceString: MERS-CoV emerged in humans from bats through the intermediate host of camels.
targetString: MERS-CoV, in kasta oo ay la xidhiidhaan dhawr nooc oo fiidmeerta coronavirus, waxa aad moodaa inay kala baxeen dhawr qarni kahor.

sourceString: MERS-CoV, although related to several bat coronavirus species, appears to have diverged from these several centuries ago.
targetString: Coronaviruska ugu danbeeya ee la xidhiidha fiidmeertta iyo SARS-CoV waxa uu kala baxay 1986.

sourceString: The most closely related bat coronavirus and SARS-CoV diverged in 1986.
targetString: Dhabada macquulka ah ee dhalan rogaas, coronavirus-ka SARS iyo haynta coronaviruska fiidmeerta, waxa uu muujinayaa in SARS uu la xidhiidho wada jirta coronavirus ee fiidmeerta mudada dheer.

sourceString: A possible path of evolution, of SARS coronavirus and keen bat coronaviruses, suggests that SARS related coronaviruses coevolved in bats for a long time.
targetString: 1790yaadkii, kala baxa coronavirus ee lo' dibadeedka kadib markii uu ku dhacay noole kale.

sourceString: In the 1790s, equine coronavirus diverged from the bovine coronavirus after a cross-species jump.
targetString: Wixii ka danbeeyay 1890yaadkii, coronaviruska bilaa aadanka OC43 waxay kala baxeen coronaviruska lo' dibadeedka kadib markii uu inta uu daatay uu u dubay noole kale.

sourceString: Later in the 1890s, human coronavirus OC43 diverged from bovine coronavirus after another cross-species spillover event.
targetString: Waxaa la saadaaliyaa in safmarka hargabka ee 1980 uu keenay isku gudubkaas, oo aanu keenin hargabka fayrusku, maadaama oo ay isku wakhti ahaayeen, nidaamka neerfaha, iyo wixii aan la garanaynin ee keena safmarka.

sourceString: It is speculated that the flu pandemic of 1890 may have been caused by this spillover event, and not by the influenza virus, because of the related timing, neurological symptoms, and unknown causative agent of the pandemic.
targetString: Coronaviruska bilaa aadanka marka laga tago OC43 ee keena caabuqa neefsiga sidoo kale waxaa looga shakisan yahay inuu kaalin ka qaatay xanuunka neerfaha.

sourceString: Human coronavirus OC43 besides causing respiratory infections is also suspected of playing a role in neurological diseases.
targetString: 1950yaadkii coronaviruska bilaa aadanka OC43 ayaa bilaabay inuu kala baxo oo uu noqdo nooc hide side ee uu iminka yahay.

sourceString: In the 1950s, the human coronavirus OC43 began to diverge into its present genotypes.
targetString: Phylogentically, oo uu keeney fayruska joonista (Murine coronavirus), kaas oo ku dhaca beerka jiirka iyo nidaamka neerfaha, waxa uu la xidhiidhaa covornaviruska bilaa aadanka ee OC43 iyo coronaviruska lo'ada.

sourceString: Phylogentically, mouse hepatitis virus (Murine coronavirus), which infects the mouse's liver and the central nervous system, is related to  human coronavirus OC43 and bovine coronavirus.
targetString: Coronaviruska bilaa aadanka HKU1, sida fayruska hore loo sheegey, sidoo kale waxa uu ka yimid jiirka.

sourceString: Human coronavirus HKU1, like the aforementioned viruses, also has its origins in rodents.
targetString: Coronaviruska waxa ay ku kala duwan yihiin khatartooda.

sourceString: Coronaviruses vary significantly in risk factor.
targetString: Qaar ayaa dila wax ka badan 30% cida ay ku dhacaan, sida MERS-CoV, oo qaarna marka loo eego malaha waxyeelo, sida hargabka caadiga ah.

sourceString: Some can kill more than 30% of those infected, such as MERS-CoV, and some are relatively harmless, such as the common cold.
targetString: Coronavirus waxa uu keenaa qadhqadhyo oo ah calaamadiisa ugu wayn, sida xumaad, iyo cinada oo xidhka oo uu xidho bararka hungurigu.

sourceString: Coronaviruses can cause colds with major symptoms, such as fever, and a sore throat from swollen adenoids.
targetString: Coronavirus waxa uu keeni karaa xanuunada sanbabka (kuwaas oo si toos ah u ah fayrusyada xanuunada sanbabka ama xanuunada sanbabka oo ah baakteeriyada labaad) iyo cune xanuun (taas oo ah xanuun toos ah oo fayrus oo cunaha ah ama xanuun baakteeriyada oo labaad oo cunaha ah).

sourceString: Coronaviruses can cause pneumonia (either direct viral pneumonia or secondary bacterial pneumonia) and bronchitis (either direct viral bronchitis or secondary bacterial bronchitis).
targetString: Coronaviruska bilaa aadanka waxaa la ogaaday 2003, SARS-CoV, kaas oo keena xanuun aad u daran oo neefsiga ah (SARS), waxa uuna leeyahay qaab gaar ah maadaama oo uu keeno caabuq qaybta sare iyo hoose ee neefsiga inay yaraato. Lix nooc oo coronaviruska bilaa aadanka ayaa la yaqaanaa, taas oo midkiiba uu u qaybsan yahay laba nooc oo kala duwan, taas oo ka dhigaysa noocyada bilaa aadanka ee coronaviruska kuwa wada jira.

sourceString: The human coronavirus discovered in 2003, SARS-CoV, which causes severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS), has a unique pathogenesis because it causes both upper and lower respiratory tract infections.Six species of human coronaviruses are known, with one species subdivided into two different strains, making seven strains of human coronaviruses altogether.
targetString: Afar kamid ah coronavirusyadan waxa ay weli ku dhax wareegayaan bilaa aadanka oo waxa ay keenaan waxoogaa xanuun ah sida hargabka ku dhaca dadka waawyan iyo caruurta caalamka oo dhan: -OC43, -HKU1, HCoV-229E, -NL63.

sourceString: Four of these coronaviruses continually circulate in the human population and produce the generally mild symptoms of the common cold in adults and children worldwide: -OC43, -HKU1, HCoV-229E, -NL63.
targetString: Coronavirus waxa uu keenaa 15% hargabka.

sourceString: Coronaviruses cause about 15% of commons colds.
targetString: Badnaa hargabka waxaa keena rhinoviruse-yo.

sourceString: The majority of colds are caused by rhinoviruses.
targetString: Afarta coronavirus ee ugu yar waxa ay yimaadaan xiliyada bilaha jiilaalka ee cimilado qabawdahay.

sourceString: The four mild coronaviruses have a seasonal incidence occurring in the winter months in temperate climates.
targetString: Ma jirto xili gaar ah oo lagu sheego cimilada dhulka dhexe.

sourceString: There is no preference towards a particular season in tropical climates.
targetString: Coronaviruska bilaa aadanku waxa uu leeyahay calaamado guud ahaan yar:

sourceString: Four human coronaviruses produce symptoms that are generally mild:
targetString: Fayruska waxaa loo bixiyay magaca rasmi ah ee SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV).

sourceString: The virus was officially named the SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV).
targetString: Wax ka badan 8,000 oo ruux ayaa qaaday xanuunka, oo ilaa boqolkiiba toban way u dhinteen.

sourceString: More than 8,000 people were infected, about ten percent of whom died.
targetString: Sebteenber 2012, noocyo cusub oo coronavirus aha ayaa la ogaaday, oo marka hore loo yaqaanay Novel Coronavirus 2012, oo iminka waxaa loogu yeeshoaa magaca rasmiga ah ee xanuunka coronavirus ee neefsiga ee Bariga Dhexe (MERS-CoV).

sourceString: In September 2012, a new type of coronavirus was identified, initially called Novel Coronavirus 2012, and now officially named Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunku waxay soo saartay digniin isla markiiba.

sourceString: The World Health Organization issued a global alert soon after.
targetString: WHO waxay cusboonaysiisay 28 Sebteember 2012 oo waxayna sheegtey in fayrusku aanay dadku isku gudbin.

sourceString: The WHO update on 28 September 2012 said the virus did not seem to pass easily from person to person.
targetString: Laakiin, 12 Maajo 2013, waxaa la arkay dad isku gudbiyay Faransiiska oo waxaana xaqiijiyay Wasiirka Arrimaha Bulshada iyo Caafimaadka Faransiiska.

sourceString: However, on 12 May 2013, a case of human-to-human transmission in France was confirmed by the French Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.
targetString: Sidoo kale, waxaa sheegey bilaa aadan isku gudbiyay Wasaarada Caafimaadka Tuunisiga.

sourceString: In addition, cases of human-to-human transmission were reported by the Ministry of Health in Tunisia.
targetString: Labadan kiis ee la xaqiijyay waxay ka yimaadeen dad qufacay xanuunka iyo aabayaashood, kuwaas oo xanuunsanayay oo booqday Qatar iyo Suciidiga.

sourceString: Two confirmed cases involved people who seemed to have caught the disease from their late father, who became ill after a visit to Qatar and Saudi Arabia.
targetString: In kasta oo ay taasi jirto, fayrusku waxa ku afkaa inay dadku isku gudbiyaan, maadaama oo badanaa dadka qabaa ayna ka qaadin bilaa aadan.

sourceString: Despite this, it appears the virus had trouble spreading from human to human, as most individuals who are infected do not transmit the virus.
targetString: Magaca ugu danbeeyay ee fayruska waa xanuunka neefsiga Bariga Dhexe (MERS-CoV).

sourceString: The final name for the virus is Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).
targetString: Kiisaska kaliya ee Maraykanka lagu sheegey (oo badaduba may dhiman) waxa la sheegey Maajo 2014. Maajo 2015, safmar xanuunka MERS-CoV aha ayaa lagu arkay Janhuuriyada Kuuriya, markaa soo nin u socdaalay Bariga Dhexe, uu booqday afar isbitaal oo Seoul ah si xanuunka looga daweeyo.

sourceString: The only U.S. cases (both survived) were recorded in May 2014.In May 2015, an outbreak of MERS-CoV occurred in the Republic of Korea, when a man who had traveled to the Middle East, visited four hospitals in the Seoul area to treat his illness.
targetString: Taasi waxay keentay safmar balaadhan oo MERS-CoV ah oo Bariga Dhexe ah.

sourceString: This caused one of the largest outbreaks of MERS-CoV outside the Middle East.
targetString: Diseember 2019, 2,468 kiisas oo xanuunka MERS-CoV ah ayaa la xaqiijiyay kadib markii lagu sameeyay shaybaadh, 851 ayaa aad u arnaa, xadiga dhimashadu waxay ahayn celcelis ahaan 34.5%.

sourceString: As of December 2019, 2,468 cases of MERS-CoV infection had been confirmed by laboratory tests, 851 of which were fatal, a mortality rate of approximately 34.5%.
targetString: Diseember 2019, safmar xanuunada sanbabka ah ayaa lagu sheegey Wuhan, Jayna.

sourceString: In December 2019, a pneumonia outbreak was reported in Wuhan, China.
targetString: Diseember 31, 2019, waxaa safmarkaa lagu sheegey inuu yahay novel nooca ah ee coronavirus, taas oo markii danbe ay siisay magaca ah 2019 nCoV Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunku (WHO), oo markii danbe ay ku magacaabeen SARS-CoV-2 Gudida Caalamiga ah ee Taxonomy ee Fayrusyadu.

sourceString: On 31 December 2019, the outbreak was traced to a novel strain of coronavirus, which was given the interim name 2019-nCoV by the World Health Organization (WHO), later renamed SARS-CoV-2 by the International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses.
targetString: Daraasadaha qaar ayaa muujinaya in Suuqa Jimlada Cuntada Bada ee Huanan aanu ahayn meesha uu ka yimid fayrusku oo uu bilaa aadanka uga soo gudbay. 17 Abriil 2020, waxaa jiray ugu yaraan 153,822 dhimasho oo la xaqiijyay inuu keenay iyo wax ka badan 2,240,191 qof oo la hubo inuu ku dhacay safmarka xanuunka coronavirus.

sourceString: Some researchers have suggested the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market may not be the original source of viral transmission to humans.As of 17 April 2020, there have been at least 153,822 confirmed deaths and more than 2,240,191 confirmed cases in the coronavirus pneumonia pandemic.
targetString: Nooca Wuhan waxaa la sheegey inuu yahay nooc cusub oo Betacoronarus ah oo ka tirsan kooxda 2B oo celcelis ahaan 70% ay hide side ahaan isku mid yihiin SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The Wuhan strain has been identified as a new strain of Betacoronavirus from group 2B with approximately 70% genetic similarity to the SARS-CoV.
targetString: Fayrusku waxa uu 96% lamid yahay coronaviruska fiidmeerta, markaa waxaa si wayn looga shakisan yahay inuuka yimid fiidmeerta sidoo kale.

sourceString: The virus has a 96% similarity to a bat coronavirus, so it is widely suspected to originate from bats as well.
targetString: Safmarku waxa uu keeney xadidaad socdaalka ah iyo in bandoo dalka oo dhan lagu soo rodo dalal badan.

sourceString: The pandemic has resulted in travel restrictions and nationwide lockdowns in several countries.
targetString: Coronavirus waxaa loo aqoonsaday inuu yahay xaalad keenta safmar oo dawooyinka xoolaha lagu dawayn jiray ilaa 1930yaadkii.

sourceString: Coronaviruses have been recognized as causing pathological conditions in veterinary medicine since the 1930s.
targetString: Marka laga tago fayruska xanuunka cunaha, badanaa xanuunadu waxay ku sugan yihiin xiidmaha.

sourceString: Except for avian infectious bronchitis, the major related diseases have mainly an intestinal location.
targetString: Coronavirus waxa uu marka kowaad saameeyaa neefsiga inta sare waana xanuun neefsiga ah oo xayawaanka wax jaqsiiya iyo shimbirada ah.

sourceString: Coronaviruses primarily infect the upper respiratory and gastrointestinal tract of mammals and birds.
targetString: Sidoo kale waxa uu keenaa xanuuno kala duwan oo xoolaha la dhaqdo ah iyo xayawaanka la carbiyo, kuwaas oo qaar kamid ahi ay aad u daran yihiin oo waxaanay khatar ku noqdaan beeralayda.

sourceString: They also cause a range of diseases in farm animals and domesticated pets, some of which can be serious and are a threat to the farming industry.
targetString: Digaaga, fayruska xanuunka cunada (IBV), coronavirus, kaliya ma bartilmaameedsado neefsiga laakiin sidoo kale unugyada taranka.

sourceString: In chickens, the infectious bronchitis virus (IBV), a coronavirus, targets not only the respiratory tract but also the urogenital tract.
targetString: Fayrusku waxa uu u faafaa unugyada kala duwan isaga oo kasoo gudbay digaaga.

sourceString: The virus can spread to different organs throughout the chicken.
targetString: Saamaynta dhaqaale ee coronavirus ee xoolaha la dhaqdo waxaa kamid ah coronaviruska doofaarka (coronavirus neefsiga iskugu gudba, TGE) iyo coronaviruska lo'da, kaas oo ku keeni kara xoolaha shuban.

sourceString: Economically significant coronaviruses of farm animals include porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus, TGE) and bovine coronavirus, which both result in diarrhea in young animals.
targetString: Coronavirusyada bisadaha: laba nooc oo coronaviruska xiidmaha bisadaha waxaa weeye xanuun yar oo aan waynayn, laakiin waxa uu keeni karaa cabuuqa uurku jirta bisada (FIP), xanuun leh dhimasho badan.

sourceString: Feline coronavirus: two forms, feline enteric coronavirus is a pathogen of minor clinical significance, but spontaneous mutation of this virus can result in feline infectious peritonitis (FIP), a disease associated with high mortality.
targetString: Sidoo kale, waxaa jira laba nooc oo coronavirus ah oo markaa ku dhaca ilwaynta: Xanuunka coronavirus ee gala ilwayntu waxa uu keenaa xanuun neefsiga ah oo loo yaqaan epizootic catarrhal enteritis (ECE), iyo mid aad u daran oo ah nuqul nidaam adag oo fayruska ah (sida FIP ee bisadaha) oo loo yaqaan nidaamka ferret ee coronavirus (FSC).

sourceString: Similarly, there are two types of coronavirus that infect ferrets: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes a gastrointestinal syndrome known as epizootic catarrhal enteritis (ECE), and a more lethal systemic version of the virus (like FIP in cats) known as ferret systemic coronavirus (FSC).
targetString: Waxaa jira laba nooc oo canine coronavirus ah (CCoV), mid keena xanuun yar iyo mid la ogaaday inuu keeno xanuunka neefsiga.

sourceString: There are two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV), one that causes mild gastrointestinal disease and one that has been found to cause respiratory disease.
targetString: Fayruska jooniska jiirka (MHV) waxa weeye coronavirus keeni kara waxoogaa safmar ah oo aad u dhimasho badan, gaar ahaan jiirka lagu hayo shaybaadhka.

sourceString: Mouse hepatitis virus (MHV) is a coronavirus that causes an epidemic murine illness with high mortality, especially among colonies of laboratory mice.
targetString: Fayruska Sialodacryoadenitis (SDAV) waxa uu leeyahay caabuq aad u sareeya oo coronavirus ah oo shaybaadhka jiirka ah, kaas oo dadku isku gudbiyaan iyada oo isku dhawaanayaa iyo neefsiga aan tooska ahayn.

sourceString: Sialodacryoadenitis virus (SDAV) is highly infectious coronavirus of laboratory rats, which can be transmitted between individuals by direct contact and indirectly by aerosol.
targetString: Waxyaaba qaar uu keeno MHV waxa uu keenaa demyelinating encephalitis socda oo jiirka ah kaas oo keeni kara murine qaabka ah ee sclerosisi badan.

sourceString: Some strains of MHV cause a progressive demyelinating encephalitis in mice which has been used as a murine model for multiple sclerosis.
targetString: Dadaal badan oo daraasado ayaa diirada saara in meesha laga saaro fayruska coronavirus ee xayawaankan, gaar haan khabiirada fayruska ee la socda dawooyinka xoolaha iyo xanuunada xayawaanka.

sourceString: Significant research efforts have been focused on elucidating the viral pathogenesis of these animal coronaviruses, especially by virologists interested in veterinary and zoonotic diseases.
targetString: Coronaviruska Porcine (waxa weeye coronavirus isku gudba oo neefsiga ah oo doofaarka, TGEV).

sourceString: Porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus of pigs, TGEV).
targetString: Coronaviruska lo'da (BCV), waxa uu ku keenaa xanuun daran lo'da yar.

sourceString: Bovine coronavirus (BCV), responsible for severe profuse enteritis in of young calves.
targetString: Coronaviruska bisadaha (FCoV) waxa uu ku keenaa xanuun bisada sidoo kale xanuun daran oo uur ku jirta ah bisadaha (nooc kale oo isla fayruska ah).

sourceString: Feline coronavirus (FCoV) causes mild enteritis in cats as well as severe Feline infectious peritonitis (other variants of the same virus).
targetString: labada coronavirus ee ayda (CCoV) (mid waxa uu keenaa olol, kuwa kalena waxaa weeye xanuuno neefsiga ah).

sourceString: the two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV) (one causing enteritis, the other found in respiratory diseases).
targetString: Coronaviruska Digirinka (TCV) waxa uu keenaa olol digirinka ah/

sourceString: Turkey coronavirus (TCV) causes enteritis in turkeys.
targetString: Xanuunka caloosha coronavirus ee ilwaynta waxa uu keenaa xanuun uurku jirta ah oo safmarka ah ilwaynta ah.

sourceString: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes epizootic catarrhal enteritis in ferrets.
targetString: Coronaruska qaabaysan ee ilwayta ee uu keeno FIP sida xanuunka nidaamka ee ilwaynta.

sourceString: Ferret systemic coronavirus causes FIP-like systemic syndrome in ferrets.
targetString: Coronaviruska uurku jirta ee bakaylaha oo ku keena xanuun daran oo neefsiga ah iyo shuban bakaylayaasha yaryar ee Yurub.

sourceString: Rabbit enteric coronavirus causes acute gastrointestinal disease and diarrhea in young European rabbits.
targetString: Fayruska shubanka safmarka ah ee doofaarka (PED aa PEDV), waxa lagu arkay caalamka oo dhan.

sourceString: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PED or PEDV), has emerged around the world.
targetString: b' Xanuunka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) waxa uu leeyahay xanuun safmarka h oo keena xanuun neefsiga oo daran oo coronavirus 2 ah (SARS-CoV--2).
